conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“为政以德，譬如北辰，居其所而众星共之。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“用道德来统治国家的人，就会像北极星一样处在一定的位置，所有的星辰都会环绕在它的周围。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“《诗》三百，一言以蔽之，曰：‘思无邪’。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“《诗经》三百篇，可以用一句话来概括它，就是‘思想纯正’。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“道之以政，齐之以刑，民免而无耻。道之以德，齐之以礼，有耻且格。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“用强权手段、法制禁令来管理百姓，使用刑法来约束他们，老百姓只能免于犯罪受惩罚，却没有了廉耻之心；用道德引导百姓，用礼制去统一百姓的言行，不但懂得廉洁是非，而且从心里归服。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“吾十有五而志于学，三十而立，四十而不惑，五十而知天命，六十而耳顺，七十而从心所欲，不逾矩。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我十五岁立志于学习；三十岁就有了自己的德行和做人的原则；四十岁遇到事情不再感到困惑；五十岁就知道哪些是不能为人力支配的事情而乐知天命；六十岁能正确对待各种言论，不觉得不能接受；七十岁能随心所欲而不越出规矩。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孟懿子问孝，子曰：“无违。”
conversation.output: 孟懿子问什么是孝，孔子说：“孝就是不要违背礼。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 樊迟御，子告之曰：“孟孙问孝于我，我对曰‘无违’。”
conversation.output: 不久，樊迟替孔子驾车，孔子告诉他说：“孟孙问我什么是孝道，我回答他说不要违背礼。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 樊迟曰：“何谓也？”
conversation.output: 樊迟说：“这是什么意思呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“生，事之以礼；死，葬之以礼，祭之以礼。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“父母活着的时候，要依照规定的礼节侍奉他们；父母去世后，依规定的礼节安葬他们，祭祀他们。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孟武伯问孝。子曰：“父母唯其疾之忧。”
conversation.output: 孟武伯问什么是孝。孔子说：“父母只用为儿女的身体健康担忧，而不用担忧其他方面。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子游问孝。子曰：“今之孝者，是谓能养。至于犬马皆能有养；不敬，何以别乎？”
conversation.output: 子游问什么是孝。孔子说：“当今许多人认为的孝呀，就是能够赡养父母便足够了。其实狗和马，也都有人饲养。如果对自己的父母不恭敬孝顺，那么赡养父母与饲养犬马又有什么区别呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏问孝。子曰：“色难。有事，弟子服其劳；有酒食，先生馔，曾是以为孝乎？”
conversation.output: 子夏问什么是孝。孔子说：“侍奉父母时，最不容易的就是对父母和颜悦色。有了事情，儿女替父母去做，有了可口的饭菜，让父母吃，难道能认为这样就可以算是孝了吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“吾与回言终日，不违，如愚。退而省其私，亦足以发，回也不愚。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我给颜回授课，一整天下来他都不提任何反对意见和疑问，像个愚钝的人。等他回去后，我观察他私下里同别人讨论时，却能发挥我所讲的，可见颜回他并不愚笨呀！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“视其所以，观其所由，察其所安，人焉廋哉？人焉廋哉？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“看一个人的所作所为，应看他言行的动机，观察他所走的道路，了解他心安于什么事情。这样，这个人怎样能隐藏得了呢？这个人怎样能隐藏得了呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“温故而知新，可以为师矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“温习学过的知识，可以从中获得新的理解与体会，那么就可以凭借这一点去做老师了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子不器。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子不像器具那样，只有一种用途。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡问君子。子曰：“先行其言而后从之。”
conversation.output: 子贡问怎样做一个君子。孔子说：“应该先行动实践自己想要说的话，做到后再把它说出来。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子周而不比，小人比而不周。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子团结众人却不与人勾结，品格卑劣的人则是互相勾结。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“只是学习却不思考就会望文生义，迷惑而无所得，只是思考却不学习就会精神疲倦而无所得。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“攻乎异端，斯害也已！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“批判不正确的言论，祸害就可以消灭。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“由，诲女，知之乎！知之为知之，不知为不知，是知也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“仲由啊，让为师教导你对待知与不知的态度吧！知道就是知道，不知道就是不知道，这才是聪明的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张学干禄。子曰：“多闻阙疑，慎言其余，则寡尤；多见阙殆，慎行其余，则寡悔。言寡尤，行寡悔，禄在其中矣。”
conversation.output: 子张要学谋取官职的办法。孔子说：“要多听，不明白的地方先放在一旁不说，对于真正懂得的，也要谨慎地说出来，这样就能少犯错误；要多看，有疑惑的先放在一旁不做，对于真正懂的，也要谨慎地去做，这样就能减少事后懊悔。说话很少犯错，做事很少后悔，自然就有官职俸禄了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 哀公问曰：“何为则民服？”孔子对曰：“举直错诸枉，则民服；举枉错诸直，则民不服。”
conversation.output: 鲁哀公问：“用什么方法才能让老百姓服从呢？”孔子回答说：“提拔那些正直的人，让他们居于不正直的人之上，老百姓就会服从了；把不正直的人提拔上来，让他们居于正直的人之上，老百姓就不会服从统治了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 季康子问：“使民敬、忠以劝，如之何？”
conversation.output: 季康子问道：“要让老百姓恭敬、尽忠并互相勉励，应该怎么做呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“临之以庄，则敬；孝慈，则忠；举善而教不能，则劝。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“如果你用庄重的态度对待他们，他们就会恭敬；如果你能孝顺父母、爱护幼小，他们就会忠诚；如果你能任用贤能之士，教育能力低下的人，他们就会互相勉励。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 或谓孔子曰：“子奚不为政？”
conversation.output: 有人对孔子说：“你为什么不去从政呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“《书》云：‘孝乎惟孝，友于兄弟，施于有政。’是亦为政，奚其为为政？”
conversation.output: 孔子回答说：“《尚书》上说，‘孝就是孝敬父母，友爱兄弟。’把这孝悌的道理施于政事，也就是参与政事了，你以为要怎样才能算是参与政事呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“人而无信，不知其可也。大车无輗，小车无軏，其何以行之哉？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“一个人如果不讲信用，不知道他还能做什么。就好像牛车没有大车辕和车辕前横木相接的关键，马车没有辕前横木两端的木销，它还怎么行驶呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张问：“十世可知也？”
conversation.output: 子张问孔子：“今后十世的礼仪制度可以预知吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“殷因于夏礼，所损益，可知也；周因于殷礼，所损益，可知也。其或继周者，虽百世，可知也。”
conversation.output: 孔子回答说：“商朝承袭了夏朝的礼仪制度，其中减少和所增加的内容是可以知道的；周朝又承袭了商朝的礼仪制度，其中减少和所增加的内容也是可以知道的。以后如果有继承周朝的朝代，就是一百世以后的情况，也是可以预先知道的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“非其鬼而祭之，谄也；见义不为，无勇也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不是你应该祭祀的鬼神，你去祭它，就是谄媚。见到应该挺身而出的事情，却袖手旁观，就是怯懦。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子于乡党，恂恂如也，似不能言者；其在宗庙朝庭，便便言，唯谨尔。
conversation.output: 孔子在家乡时，非常恭顺温和，好似不会说话的样子。但他在宗庙里、朝廷上，说话却明白畅达，只是说得很谨慎。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 朝，与下大夫言，侃侃如也；与上大夫言，訚訚如也。
conversation.output: 上朝的时候，国君还没有到来，孔子同下大夫说话，温和而快乐；同上大夫说话，正直而恭敬；

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 君在，踧踖如也，与与如也。
conversation.output: 国君已经来了，恭敬而心中不安，但是仪态又安祥适度。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 君召使摈，色勃如也，足躩如也。
conversation.output: 国君召孔子去接待宾客，他的面色庄重矜持，步伐轻快。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 揖所与立，左右手，衣前后襜如也。
conversation.output: 向同他站在一起的人作揖，向左向右拱手，衣裳随之前后摆动，却显得整齐。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 趋进，翼如也。
conversation.output: 快步向前时，好像鸟儿舒展开了翅膀。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 宾退，必复命曰：“宾不顾矣。”
conversation.output: 宾客告退了，他一定向君王回报说：“客人已经不回头了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 入公门，鞠躬如也，如不容。
conversation.output: 孔子走进朝堂的大门，显出小心谨慎的样子，好像没有容身之地。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 立不中门，行不履阈。
conversation.output: 他不站在门的中间，进门时不踩门坎。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 过位，色勃如也，足躩如也，其言似不足者。
conversation.output: 经过国君的座位时，脸色变得庄重起来，脚步也快起来，说话的声音低微得像气力不足似的。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 摄齐升堂，鞠躬如也，屏气似不息者。
conversation.output: 他提起衣服的下摆走上堂去，显得小心谨慎，憋住气，好像不呼吸一样。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 出，降一等，逞颜色，怡怡如也；没阶，趋进，翼如也；复其位，踧踖如也。
conversation.output: 走出来，下了一级台阶，面色舒展，怡然和乐。走完了台阶，快步向前，姿态好像鸟儿展翅一样。回到自己的位置，又是恭敬而谨慎的样子。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 执圭，鞠躬如也，如不胜。
conversation.output: 孔子出使别的诸侯国，行聘问礼时拿着圭，恭敬谨慎，像是拿不动的样子。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 上如揖，下如授。
conversation.output: 向上举时好像在作揖，向下放圭时好像在交给别人。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 勃如战色，足蹜蹜如有循。
conversation.output: 神色庄重，战战兢兢；脚步紧凑，好像在沿着一条线行走。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 享礼，有容色。私觌，愉愉如也。
conversation.output: 在举行赠送礼物的仪式时，显得和颜悦色。和国君举行私下会见的时候，更轻松愉快了。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 君子不以绀緅饰，红紫不以为亵服。
conversation.output: 君子不用青中透红或黑中透红的布做镶边，红色和紫色不用来做平常家居的便服。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 当暑袗絺绤，必表而出之。
conversation.output: 暑天，穿细葛布或粗葛布做的单衣，一定是套在外面。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 缁衣羔裘，素衣麑裘，黄衣狐裘。
conversation.output: 黑色的衣配羔羊皮袍，白色的衣配小鹿皮袍，黄色的衣配狐皮袍。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 亵裘长，短右袂。
conversation.output: 居家穿的皮袄比较长，可是右边的袖子要短一些。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 必有寝衣，长一身有半。
conversation.output: 睡觉一定要有小被，长度是人身长的一倍半。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 狐貉之厚以居。
conversation.output: 用厚厚的狐貉皮做坐垫。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 去丧，无所不佩。非帷裳，必杀之。
conversation.output: 服丧期满之后，任何饰物都可以佩带。不是上朝和祭祀时穿的礼服，一定要经过裁剪。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 羔裘玄冠不以吊。吉月，必朝服而朝。
conversation.output: 羊羔皮袍和黑色礼帽都不能穿戴着去吊丧。每月初一，一定要穿着上朝的礼服去朝贺。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 齐，必有明衣，布。齐必变食，居必迁坐。
conversation.output: 斋戒沐浴的时候，一定要有浴衣，用布做的。斋戒的时候，一定要改变平常的饮食，居住也一定搬移地方，（不与妻妾同房）。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 食不厌精，脍不厌细。
conversation.output: 粮食不嫌舂得精，鱼和肉不嫌切得细。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 食饐而餲，鱼馁而肉败，不食.
conversation.output: 粮食霉烂发臭，鱼和肉腐烂，都不吃。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 色恶，不食；臭恶，不食；失饪，不食；不时，不食；割不正，不食；不得其酱，不食。
conversation.output: 食物颜色难看，不吃。气味难闻，不吃。烹调不当，不吃。不到该当吃食时候，不吃。不是按一定方法砍割的肉，不吃。佐料放得不适当，不吃。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 肉虽多，不使胜食气。
conversation.output: 席上的肉虽多，但吃的量不超过米面的量。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 唯酒无量，不及乱。
conversation.output: 只有酒没有限制，但不喝醉。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 沽酒市脯，不食。
conversation.output: 从市上买来的肉干和酒，不吃。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 不撤姜食，不多食。
conversation.output: 每餐必须有姜，但也不多吃。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 祭于公，不宿肉。祭肉不出三日，出三日不食之矣。
conversation.output: 参加国家祭祀典礼，分到的祭肉当天就食用不放过夜。一般祭肉的留存不超过三天。放超过了三天，就不吃了。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 食不语，寝不言。
conversation.output: 嘴里吃着东西的时候不说话，到了该睡觉的时候就不要发出声音吵到他人。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 虽疏食菜羹，瓜祭，必齐如也。
conversation.output: 虽然是粗米饭蔬菜汤，饭前也要取一些出来祭祖，而且祭的时候还一定恭恭敬敬，好像斋戒了的一样。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 席不正，不坐。
conversation.output: 铺在地面上席子放得不端正，不坐。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 乡人饮酒，杖者出，斯出矣。
conversation.output: 同本乡人在一块儿饮酒，等老年人都出去了，自己这才出去。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 乡人傩，朝服而立于阼阶。
conversation.output: 乡里人举行迎神驱疫的仪式时，孔子穿着朝服站在东边的台阶上。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 问人于他邦，再拜而送之。
conversation.output: 孔子托人向住在其他诸侯国的朋友问候时，便向受托者拜两次送行。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 康子馈药，拜而受之。曰：“丘未达，不敢尝。”
conversation.output: 季康子给孔子赠送药品，孔子拜谢之后接受了，说：“我对这种药的药性不了解，不敢尝用试服。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 厩焚，子退朝，曰：“伤人乎？”不问马。
conversation.output: 马棚失火烧掉了，孔子退朝回来，说：“伤到人了吗？”不问马的情况怎么样。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 君赐食，必正席先尝之；君赐腥，必熟而荐之；君赐生，必畜之。
conversation.output: 国君赐给食物，孔子一定会摆正席位先尝一尝。国君赐给生肉，他一定会煮熟了，先给祖先上供。国君赐给活物，他一定会养起来。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 侍食于君，君祭，先饭。
conversation.output: 陪侍国君吃饭，当国君进行饭前祭祀的时候，他先取国君面前的饭菜为他尝食。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 疾，君视之，东首，加朝服，拖绅。
conversation.output: 孔子病了，国君来探望他，他便头朝东躺着，身上盖上朝服，拖着大带子。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 君命召，不俟驾行矣。
conversation.output: 国君召见孔子，他不等车马驾好就先步行走去了。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 入太庙，每事问。
conversation.output: 孔子到了太庙，每件事都要问一问。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 朋友死，无所归，曰：“于我殡。”
conversation.output: 孔子朋友去世了，没有亲属负责敛埋，孔子说：“我来负责为他办理后事吧。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 朋友之馈，虽车马，非祭肉，不拜。
conversation.output: 对于朋友的馈赠，即使是车和马，只要不是祭祀用的肉，孔子在接受时，也不会行拜谢礼。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 寝不尸，居不客。
conversation.output: 孔子睡觉不像死尸那样直挺着，平时在家闲住不讲究那么多礼仪。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 见齐衰者，虽狎，必变。
conversation.output: 见穿齐衰这种丧服的人，即使关系再亲密，也必定严肃。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 见冕者与瞽者，虽亵，必以貌。
conversation.output: 见戴礼帽的人和盲人，虽然是一般性的会见，也一定礼貌相待。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 凶服者式之，式负版者。
conversation.output: 坐着车在路上遇到穿丧服的人，一定身体前倾，用手扶住车前的横木，表示同情。遇见背负着国家图籍的人也一样。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 有盛馔，必变色而作。迅雷风烈，必变。
conversation.output: 做客时如果有丰盛的饭菜，一定表情严肃，站起来致谢。遇到迅雷和大风，一定表情严肃以示对天的敬畏。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 升车，必正立，执绥。车中不内顾，不疾言，不亲指。
conversation.output: 登车时，一定先端端正正地站直，然后拉着车上的绳索上车，在车上，不回头看，不急切说话，不指指画画。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 色斯举矣，翔而后集。曰：“山梁雌雉，时哉时哉！”
conversation.output: 孔子在山谷中行走，看见一群野鸡在那儿飞，孔子神色动了一下，野鸡飞着盘旋了一阵后，又落在了一处。孔子说：“这些山梁上的母野鸡，得其时呀！得其时呀！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路共之，三嗅而作。
conversation.output: 子路向它们拱拱手，野鸡振几下翅膀飞走了。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“先进于礼乐，野人也；后进于礼乐，君子也。如用之，则吾从先进。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“先学习了礼乐而后做官的，是原来没有爵禄的平民；先做了官而后学习礼乐的，是卿大夫的子弟。如果让我来选用人才，那么我赞成选用先学习礼乐的人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“从我于陈、蔡者，皆不及门也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“曾跟我在陈国、蔡国之间遭受困厄的弟子们，现在都不在我的身边了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 德行：颜渊，闵子骞，冉伯牛，仲弓。言语：宰我，子贡。政事：冉有，季路。文学：子游，子夏。
conversation.output: 德行好的有：颜渊、闵子骞、冉伯牛、仲弓；能说会道的有：宰 我、子贡；精于政事的有：冉有、季路；通晓古典文献的有：子游、 子夏。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“回也非助我者也，于吾言无所不说。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“颜回这个人啊，不是对我有帮助的人，他对我说的话没有不喜欢的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“孝哉闵子骞！人不间于其父母昆弟之言。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“闵子骞真是孝顺呀！人们对于他的父母兄弟称赞他的话没有异议。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 南容三复白圭，孔子以其兄之子妻之。
conversation.output: 南容把几句“白圭”诗读了好多遍,孔子就把自己老兄的女儿嫁给了他。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 季康子问：“弟子孰为好学？”
conversation.output: 季康子问孔子：“你的弟子中谁最好学呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子对曰：“有颜回者好学，不幸短命死矣，今也则亡。”
conversation.output: 孔子回答说：“有一个叫颜回的学生很好学，不幸早逝了。现在再也没有像他那样的了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 颜渊死，颜路请子之车以为之椁。
conversation.output: 颜渊死了，他的父亲颜路请求孔子把车卖了给颜渊做一个外椁。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“才不才，亦各言其子也。鲤也死，有棺而无椁，吾不徒行以为之椁。以吾从大夫之后，不可徒行也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不管有才能还是没才能，说来也都是各自的儿子。孔鲤死了，也只有棺，没有椁。我不能卖掉车子步行来给他置办椁。因为我曾经做过大夫，是不可以徒步出行的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 颜渊死。子曰：“噫！天丧予！天丧予！”
conversation.output: 颜渊死了，孔子说：“唉！天要亡我呀！天要亡我呀！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 颜渊死，子哭之恸，从者曰：“子恸矣！”曰：“有恸乎？非夫人之为恸而谁为？”
conversation.output: 颜渊死了，孔子哭得极其悲痛。跟随孔子的人说：“您悲痛过度了！”孔子说：“是太悲伤过度了吗？我不为这个人悲伤过度，又为谁呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 颜渊死，门人欲厚葬之，子曰：“不可。”
conversation.output: 颜渊死了，孔子的学生们想要厚葬他。孔子说：“不可以”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 门人厚葬之，子曰：“回也视予犹父也，予不得视犹子也。非我也，夫二三子也！”
conversation.output: 学生们还是厚葬了他。孔子说：“颜回把我当父亲一样看待，我却不能像对待儿子一样看待他。这不是我的意思呀，是那些学生们要这样办。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 季路问事鬼神，子曰：“未能事人，焉能事鬼？”曰：“敢问死。”曰：“未知生，焉知死？”
conversation.output: 季路问服侍鬼神的方法。孔子说：“人还不能服侍，怎么能去服侍鬼神呢？”季路又说：“敢问死是怎么回事？”孔子说：'对生都知道得不清楚，哪里能知道死呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 闵子侍侧，訚訚如也；子路，行行如也；冉有、子贡，侃侃如也。子乐。“若由也，不得其死然。”
conversation.output: 闵子骞侍立在孔子身边，样子正直而恭敬；子路是很刚强的样子；冉有、子贡的样子温和快乐。孔子很高兴。但他说：“像仲由这样，恐怕得不到善终。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 鲁人为长府，闵子骞曰：“仍旧贯如之何？何必改作？”子曰：“夫人不言，言必有中。”
conversation.output: 鲁国的执政大臣要翻修长府。闵子骞说：“照老样子不好吗？何必一定要翻修呢？”孔子说：“闵子骞这个人平常不大说话，但一开口必定说到要害上。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“由之瑟奚为于丘之门？”门人不敬子路，子曰：“由也升堂矣，未入于室也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“仲由弹瑟，为什么在我这里弹呢？”孔子的其他学生因此而不尊重子路。孔子说：“仲由的学问啊，已经具备规模了，只是还不够精深罢了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡问：“师与商也孰贤？”子曰：“师也过，商也不及。”曰：“然则师愈与？”子曰：“过犹不及。”
conversation.output: 子贡问孔子：“子张和子夏二人谁更优秀呢？”孔子回答说：“颛孙师有些过分，卜商有些赶不上。”子贡说：“那么是子张优秀一些吗？”孔子说：“过分和不足是一样的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 季氏富于周公，而求也为之聚敛而附益之。子曰：“非吾徒也，小子鸣鼓而攻之可也。”
conversation.output: 季氏比周天子左右的卿士还要富有，冉求还帮他搜刮来增加他的钱财。孔子说：“他不是我的学生了，你们可以大张旗鼓地去攻击他吧！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 柴也愚，参也鲁，师也辟，由也喭。
conversation.output: 高柴愚笨，曾参迟钝，颛孙师偏激，仲由鲁莽。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“回也其庶乎，屡空。赐不受命而货殖焉，亿则屡中。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“颜回呀，他的道德修养已经差不多了，可是他常常很贫困。端木赐不听天由命，而去做生意，猜测市场行情往往很准。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张问善人之道，子曰：“不践迹，亦不入于室。”
conversation.output: 子张问成为善人的方法。孔子说：“如果不沿着前人的脚印走，其学问和修养就不到家。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“论笃是与，君子者乎，色庄者乎？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“总是谈论、赞许那些言语诚实的人。这种善谈的人到底是真君子呢？还是只是伪装庄重的人呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路问：“闻斯行诸？”子曰：“有父兄在，如之何其闻斯行之？”
conversation.output: 子路问：“听到了应当做的事情就要立刻去做吗？”孔子说：“有父亲兄弟在，怎么能听到就立刻去做呢。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 冉有问：“闻斯行诸？”子曰：“闻斯行之。
conversation.output: 冉有问：“听到了就行动起来吗？”孔子说：“听到了就行动起来。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 公西华曰：“由也问闻斯行诸，子曰‘有父兄在’；求也问闻斯行诸，子曰‘闻斯行之’赤也惑，敢问。”
conversation.output: 公西华说：“仲由问‘听到了就行动起来吗？’你回答说‘有父兄健在’，冉求问‘听到了就行动起来吗？’你回答‘听到了就行动起来’。我被弄糊涂了，敢再问个明白。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“求也退，故进之；由也兼人，故退之。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“冉求平日做事退缩，所以我激励他；仲由好勇胜人，所以我要压压他。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子畏于匡，颜渊后。子曰：“吾以女为死矣！”曰：“子在，回何敢死！”
conversation.output: 孔子被囚禁在匡地，颜渊后来赶来。孔子说：“我还以为你死了呢。”颜渊说：“您还活着，我怎么敢先死呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 季子然问：“仲由、冉求可谓大臣与？”子曰：“吾以子为异之问，曾由与求之问。所谓大臣者，以道事君，不可则止。今由与求也，可谓具臣矣。”曰：“然则从之者与？”
conversation.output: 季子然问：“仲由和冉求可以称作是大臣吗？”孔子说：“我以为你是问别人，原来是问仲由和冉求呀。我们所说的大臣，应该能以合于仁道的方式去侍奉君主，如果行不通，便宁可不干。现在由和求这两个人呀，只算得上是备位充数的臣罢了。”季子然又问：“那么，他们肯听话吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“弑父与君，亦不从也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“如果是杀父亲杀君主，他们也是不会听从的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路使子羔为费宰，子曰：“贼夫人之子。”
conversation.output: 子路叫子羔去做费地的长官。孔子说：“是祸害子弟的做法。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路曰：“有民人焉，有社稷焉，何必读书然后为学。”
conversation.output: 子路说：“有百姓，有土地五谷，何必读书才算学习？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“是故恶夫佞者。”
conversation.output: 子说：“所以我讨厌那些能说会道的人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路、曾皙、冉有、公西华侍坐，子曰：“以吾一日长乎尔，毋吾以也。居则曰‘不吾知也’如或知尔，则何以哉？”
conversation.output: 子路、曾晳、冉有、公西华陪孔子坐着。孔子说：“不要因为我年纪比你们大一点，就不敢讲了。（你们）平时常说：‘没有人了解我呀！’假如有人了解你们，那么你们打算怎么做呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路率尔而对曰：“千乘之国，摄乎大国之间，加之以师旅，因之以饥馑，由也为之，比及三年，可使有勇，且知方也。”
conversation.output: 子路不假思索地回答说：“一个拥有一千辆兵车的国家，夹在大国之间，加上外国军队的侵犯，接着又遇上饥荒；如果让我治理这个国家，等到三年功夫，就可以使人人勇敢善战，而且还懂得做人的道理。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 夫子哂之。“求，尔何如？”
conversation.output: 孔子听了，微微一笑。“冉有，你怎么样？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 对曰：“方六七十，如五六十，求也为之，比及三年，可使足民。如其礼乐，以俟君子。”
conversation.output: 冉求回答说：“一个纵横六七十里、或者五六十里的国家，如果让我去治理，等到三年，就可以使老百姓富足起来。至于修明礼乐，那就只有等待贤人君子了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: “赤！尔何如？”
conversation.output: “公西华，你怎么样？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 对曰：“非曰能之，愿学焉。宗庙之事，如会同，端章甫，愿为小相焉。”
conversation.output: 公西华回答说：“我不敢说能做什么，愿意学习罢了。宗庙祭祀的工作，或者是诸侯会盟及朝见天子的时候，我愿意穿戴好礼服礼帽做一个小小的司仪。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: “点，尔何如？”
conversation.output: “曾皙，你怎么样？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 鼓瑟希，铿尔，舍瑟而作，对曰：“异乎三子者之撰。”
conversation.output: 曾皙弹瑟的声音逐渐稀疏了，接着铿的一声，放下瑟直起身子回答说：“我和他们三人的才能不一样。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“何伤乎？亦各言其志也。”曰：“暮春者，春服既成，冠者五六人，童子六七人，浴乎沂，风乎舞雩，咏而归。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“那有什么关系呢？不过是各自谈谈自己的志向罢了。”曾皙说：“暮春时节，春天的衣服已经穿上了。和几个成年人、几个孩童到沂水里游泳，在舞雩台上吹吹风，一路唱着歌儿回来。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 夫子喟然叹曰：“吾与点也！”三子者出，曾皙后。
conversation.output: 孔子长叹一声说：“我赞同曾皙的想法呀！”子路、冉有、公西华都出去了，曾皙最后走。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曾皙曰：“夫三子者之言何如？”
conversation.output: 曾皙问孔子：“他们三个人的话怎么样？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“亦各言其志也已矣。”曰：“夫子何哂由也？”曰：“为国以礼，其言不让，是故哂之。”“唯求则非邦也与？”“安见方六七十、如五六十而非邦也者？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“也不过是各自谈谈自己的志向罢了！”曾皙说：“您为什么笑仲由呢？”孔子说：“治国要用礼，可是他的话毫不谦让，所以我笑他。”曾皙又问：“难道冉有讲的不是国家大事吗？”孔子说：“怎么见得方圆六七十里或者五六十里的地方就不是国家呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: “唯赤则非邦也与？”
conversation.output: 曾皙再问：“难道公西华讲的不是诸侯的大事吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: “宗庙会同，非诸侯而何？赤也为之小，孰能为之大？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“宗庙祭祀，诸侯会盟和朝见天子，不是诸侯的大事又是什么呢？公西华只能替诸侯做小相，那么，谁又能给诸侯做大相呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子谓季氏：“八佾舞于庭，是可忍也，孰不可忍也？”
conversation.output: 孔子谈到季氏，说，“他用天子才能用的八佾在庭院中奏乐舞蹈，这样的事他都忍心去做，还有什么事情不可狠心做出来呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 三家者以《雍》彻，子曰：“‘相维辟公，天子穆穆’，奚取于三家之堂？”
conversation.output: 孟孙氏、叔孙氏、季孙氏三家在祭祖的时候，命乐工唱着《雍》这篇诗歌来撤下祭品。孔子说：“《雍》诗中的‘诸侯都来助祭，天子恭敬地主祭’这样的意思，怎么能够用在三家大夫的庙堂里呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“人而不仁，如礼何？人而不仁，如乐何？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“一个人如果没有仁德，那他怎样遵守礼仪制度呢？一个人没有仁德，那他怎么能正确运用音乐呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 林放问礼之本，子曰：“大哉问！礼，与其奢也，宁俭；丧，与其易也，宁戚。”
conversation.output: 林放问什么是礼仪制度的根本。孔子回答说：“你问的问题意义重大。礼，与其一味的寻求奢侈，不如节俭些；办理丧事，与其在仪式上办理得妥帖，不如内心真正悲伤。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“夷狄之有君，不如诸夏之亡也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“那些不开化的地方有君主，还不如中原没有君主的地区讲礼节。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 季氏旅于泰山。子谓冉有曰：“女弗能救与？”对曰：“不能。”子曰：“呜呼！曾谓泰山不如林放乎？”
conversation.output: 季氏准备去祭祀泰山。孔子对冉有说：“你不能阻止他吗？”冉有说：“不能。”孔子说：“唉！难道说泰山神还不如林放知礼吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子无所争，必也射乎！揖让而升，下而饮。其争也君子。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子没有什么可以与人相争的事情。如果有的话，那就一定是射箭。比赛开始的时候，先相互作揖谦让，然后上场。比赛完后，又相互作揖再退下来，然后登堂喝酒。这就是君子之争。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏问曰：“‘巧笑倩兮，美目盼兮，素以为绚兮’何谓也？”子曰：“绘事后素。”曰：“礼后乎？”子曰：“起予者商也，始可与言《诗》已矣。”
conversation.output: 子夏问孔子：“‘笑得真好看啊，黑白分明的眼睛多妩媚呀，好像在洁白的质地上画着美丽的图案。’这几句话是什么意思呢？”孔子说：“这是说绘画先有白底，然后再用色彩绘画。”子夏又问：“这么说礼也是在有了仁德之心之后才产生的了？”孔子说：“卜商啊，你真是能够发挥我的思想，现在可以开始和你谈论《诗经》了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“夏礼吾能言之，杞不足征也；殷礼吾能言之，宋不足征也。文献不足故也，足则吾能征之矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“夏朝的礼仪制度，我可以说一说，但是它的后代杞国不足以证明我的话；殷朝的礼仪制度，我能说一说，但它的后代宋国不足以证明我的话。这是由于文字资料和熟悉夏礼和殷礼的人不足的缘故。如果有足够的历史资料和懂礼的人才，我就可以得到证明了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“禘自既灌而往者，吾不欲观之矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“对于行禘礼的仪式，从完成第一次献酒以后，我就不想再看了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 或问禘之说。子曰：“不知也。知其说者之于天下也，其如示诸斯乎！”指其掌。
conversation.output: 有人问孔子关于举行禘祭的规定。孔子说：“我不知道。知道的人对治理天下的事，可能像把东西放在这里一样容易吧！”说着指了指自己的手掌。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 祭如在，祭神如神在。子曰：“吾不与祭，如不祭。”
conversation.output: 祭祀祖先时，好像祖先真的就在前面；祭神的时候，好像神真的在面前。孔子说：“我如果不亲自参加祭祀，祭祀了就跟没祭祀一样。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 王孙贾问曰：“‘与其媚于奥，宁媚于灶’，何谓也？”子曰：“不然，获罪于天，无所祷也。”
conversation.output: 王孙贾问道：“‘与其祈祷较尊贵的奥神的保佑，不如祈祷有实权的灶神的赐福。’这话是什么意思？”孔子说：“不是这样的。如果犯了滔天大罪，那就怎么祈祷也没用。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“周监于二代，郁郁乎文哉！吾从周。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“周朝的礼仪制度借鉴于夏、商二朝，是多么丰富多彩啊。我主张接受周朝的制度。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子入太庙，每事问。或曰：“孰谓鄹人之子知礼乎？入太庙，每事问。”子闻之，曰：“是礼也。”
conversation.output: 孔子到了太庙，每件事都要问。有人说：“谁说这个人懂得礼呀，他到了太庙里，什么事都要问别人。”孔子听到此话后说：“这就是礼呀！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“射不主皮，为力不同科，古之道也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“射箭，不在于穿透靶子，因为人的力气有大有小。这是古人的道理呀。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡欲去告朔之饩羊，子曰：“赐也！尔爱其羊，我爱其礼。”
conversation.output: 子贡提出去掉每月初一日告祭祖庙用的活羊。孔子说：“赐，你爱惜那只羊，我却爱惜那种礼。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“事君尽礼，人以为谄也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我按照周礼的规定去侍奉君主，别人却认为这是在讨好君主。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 定公问：“君使臣，臣事君，如之何？”孔子对曰：“君使臣以礼，臣事君以忠。”
conversation.output: 鲁定公问孔子：“君主差使臣子，臣子侍奉君主，各自应该怎么做？”孔子回答说：“君主差使臣子以礼相待，臣子应该以忠来侍奉君主。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“《关雎》，乐而不淫，哀而不伤。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“《关睢》这首诗，快乐却不是毫无节制，悲哀而不过于悲伤。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 哀公问社于宰我，宰我对曰：“夏后氏以松，殷人以柏，周人以栗，曰使民战栗。”子闻之，曰：“成事不说，遂事不谏，既往不咎。”
conversation.output: 鲁哀公问宰我，做土地神的神位应该用什么木材，宰我回答：“夏朝时用松树，商朝时用柏树，周朝时用栗子树。用栗子树的意思是说：使老百姓战战栗栗。”孔子听到后说：“已经做过的事不用提了，已经完成的事不用再去劝谏了，已经过去的事也不必再追究了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“管仲之器小哉！”或曰：“管仲俭乎？”曰：“管氏有三归，官事不摄，焉得俭？”“然则管仲知礼乎？”曰：“邦君树塞门，管氏亦树塞门；邦君为两君之好，有反坫。管氏亦有反坫，管氏而知礼，孰不知礼？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“管仲的气量真小啊！”有人说：“管仲节俭吗？”孔子说：“他有三处豪华的房屋，他家里的管事也是一人一职而不兼任，怎么谈得上节俭呢？”那人又问：“那么管仲懂礼吗？”孔子回答：“国君在宫门前立了一道影壁，管仲也在自家门口立了影壁；国君设宴招待别国君主、举行友好会见时，在堂上设有放置空酒杯的土台，管仲宴客也就有这样的土台。如果说管仲知礼，那还有谁不知礼呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子语鲁大师乐，曰：“乐其可知也。始作，翕如也；从之，纯如也，皦如也，绎如也，以成。”
conversation.output: 孔子给鲁国乐官讲奏乐过程，说：“演奏的原理是可以知道的。开始演奏时，各种乐器合奏，声音宏亮优美；乐曲继续展开下去，悠扬悦耳，节奏分明，如流水绵绵流淌，直至演奏结束。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 仪封人请见，曰：“君子之至于斯也，吾未尝不得见也。”从者见之。出曰：“二三子何患于丧乎？天下之无道也久矣，天将以夫子为木铎。”
conversation.output: 仪地的一个小官请求会见孔子，说：“凡是到这个地方的君子，我没有不求见的。”孔子的学生们领他去见孔子。出来以后，他说：“你们几位为什么担心失去官位呢？天下无道已经很久了，因此上天将以孔夫子为圣人来教化天下。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子谓《韶》：“尽美矣，又尽善也。”谓《武》：“尽美矣，未尽善也。”
conversation.output: 孔子评价《韶》，说：“乐曲很美，内容也非常好。”评价《武》，说：“乐曲很美，内容却差一些。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“居上不宽，为礼不敬，临丧不哀，吾何以观之哉？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“居于统治地位的人，不能宽厚待人，行礼的时候不恭敬，参加丧礼时也不悲哀，这种情况我怎么能看得下去呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子谓公冶长：“可妻也，虽在缧绁之中，非其罪也！”以其子妻之。
conversation.output: 孔子谈论到公冶长时，说：“可以把女儿嫁与他为妻，他虽然有过牢狱之灾，但这并不是他的罪过。”便把自己的女儿嫁给了他。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子谓南容：“邦有道不废；邦无道免于刑戮。”以其兄之子妻之。
conversation.output: 孔子评论南容时说：“国家政治清明的时候，他入仕为官不会被罢免；国家黑暗的时候，他也可以不被被刑罚。”于是把自己的侄女嫁给了他。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子谓子贱：“君子哉若人！鲁无君子者，斯焉取斯？”
conversation.output: 孔子评论子贱说：“这个人真是个君子呀！如果鲁国没有君子的话，他从哪里获得这种好品德的呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡问曰：“赐也何如？”子曰：“女器也。”曰：“何器也？”曰：“瑚琏也。”
conversation.output: 子贡问孔子说：“我这个人怎么样？”孔子说：“你呀好比一个器具。”子贡又问：“是什么器具呢？”孔子说：“祭祀时盛粮食的瑚琏。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 或曰：“雍也仁而不佞。”子曰：“焉用佞？御人以口给，屡憎于人。不知其仁，焉用佞？”
conversation.output: 有人说：“冉雍这个人有仁德，但是没有什么口才。”孔子说：“为什么一定要有口才呢？伶牙利齿的和他人争辩顶嘴，会被人讨厌。我不知道他是否可称得上仁，但为什么要有口才呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子使漆雕开仕，对曰：“吾斯之未能信。”子说。
conversation.output: 孔子让漆雕开入仕做官。漆雕开回答说：“我对做官这件事还没有信心。”孔子听了很高兴。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“道不行，乘桴浮于海，从我者其由与？”子路闻之喜，子曰：“由也好勇过我，无所取材。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“如果我的主张行不通，我就坐木筏子漂流海外。能跟从我的大概只有仲由吧！”子路听到这话很高兴。孔子说：“仲由勇武过人，他的勇猛甚至超过了我。但不善于裁夺事理。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孟武伯问：“子路仁乎？”子曰：“不知也。”又问，子曰：“由也，千乘之国，可使治其赋也，不知其仁也。”“求也何如？”
conversation.output: 孟武伯问孔子：“子路算得上有仁德吗？”孔子说：“不知道。”孟武伯又问一遍。孔子说：“仲由啊，一个具备千辆兵车的大国，可以让他去负责军事。至于他有没有仁德，我就不知道了。”又问：“冉求怎么样？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“求也，千室之邑、百乘之家，可使为之宰也，不知其仁也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“冉求呢，一个千户规模的大邑，一个具备兵车百辆的大夫封地，可以让他当总管。至于他的仁德，我弄不清。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: “赤也何如？”子曰：“赤也，束带立于朝，可使与宾客言也，不知其仁也。”
conversation.output: 孟武伯继续问：“公西赤怎么样？”孔子说：“赤呀，穿上礼服，站在朝廷上，可以让他和宾客会谈。我也不知道他是不是做到了仁。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子谓子贡曰：“女与回也孰愈？”对曰：“赐也何敢望回？回也闻一以知十，赐也闻一以知二。”子曰：“弗如也，吾与女弗如也！”
conversation.output: 孔子对子贡说：“你和颜回两个相比，谁好些？”子贡回答说：“我怎么能和颜回相比！颜回他听到一件事就可以推知十件事；我知道一件事，只能推知两件事。”孔子说：“你是不如他，我同意你说的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 宰予昼寝，子曰：“朽木不可雕也，粪土之墙不可杇也，于予与何诛？”子曰：“始吾于人也，听其言而信其行；今吾于人也，听其言而观其行。于予与改是。”
conversation.output: 宰予白天睡觉。孔子说：“腐烂的木头不堪雕刻，烂草加泥巴垒成的墙无法粉刷。对于宰予，还能再苛求什么呢！”孔子说：“以前我对人的态度，是听了他的话便相信他的行为；现在我对人的态度，是听了他的话还要观察他的行为。我是因宰予的表现而改变了对人的态度的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“吾未见刚者。”或对曰：“申枨。”子曰：“枨也欲，焉得刚。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我还没有见过刚强不屈的人。”有人回答说：“申枨就是。”孔子说：“申枨的欲望太多，怎么能刚毅不屈？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡曰：“我不欲人之加诸我也，吾亦欲无加诸人。”子曰：“赐也，非尔所及也。”
conversation.output: 子贡说：“我不愿别人把事情强加在我的身上，我也不愿把事情强加在别人身上。”孔子说：“赐呀，这不是你可以做得到的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡曰：“夫子之文章，可得而闻也；夫子之言性与天道，不可得而闻也。”
conversation.output: 子贡说：“老师关于《诗》《书》《礼》《乐》等古代文献方面知识的讲述，我们能够听得到；老师关于天性和天道的言论，我们听不到。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路有闻，未之能行，唯恐有闻。
conversation.output: 子路听了做人处事的道理，但没有能亲自实践的时候，便害怕又听到新的道理。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡问曰：“孔文子何以谓之文也？”子曰：“敏而好学，不耻下问，是以谓之文也。”
conversation.output: 子贡问道：“孔文子的谥号为什么是‘文’？”孔子说：“他天资聪明而又好学的人，不以向地位比自己低、学识比自己差的人请教为耻，所以给他谥号叫‘文’。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子谓子产：“有君子之道四焉：其行己也恭，其事上也敬，其养民也惠，其使民也义。”
conversation.output: 孔子评论子产说：“他有四个方面符合君子的标准：他自己言行谨重，事奉君主恭敬，养护百姓有恩惠，征募使用百姓公正合理。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“晏平仲善与人交，久而敬之。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“晏平仲擅长与人交朋友，时间久了，大家都很尊敬他。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“臧文仲居蔡，山节藻棁，何如其知也？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“臧文仲为产自蔡地的大乌龟盖了一间房子，中有雕刻成山形的斗拱和画着藻草的梁柱，他这个人怎么能算是有智慧呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张问曰：“令尹子文三仕为令尹，无喜色，三已之无愠色，旧令尹之政必以告新令尹，何如？”子曰：“忠矣。”曰：“仁矣乎？”曰：“未知，焉得仁？”
conversation.output: 子张问孔子说：“子文几次担任令尹的职务，没有显出高兴的样子；几次被免职，也没有显出怨恨的样了。一定把自己的一切政事全部告诉给来接任的人。你这个人怎么样？”孔子说：“可算算得上是对国家尽忠了。”子张问：“算得上又仁德了吗？”孔子说：“不知道。这怎么能算仁呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: “崔子弑齐君，陈文子有马十乘，弃而违之。至于他邦，则曰：‘犹吾大夫崔子也。’违之。之一邦，则又曰：‘犹吾大夫崔子也。’违之，何如？”
conversation.output: 子张又问：“崔杼杀了他的君主齐庄公，陈文子有四十匹马，他都丢弃不要，就离开了。到了另一个国家，说：‘这里的执政者和我国的崔子差不多’，又离开了。再到了一国，说：‘这里的执政者和我国的崔子差不多’，还是离开了。这人怎么样？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“清矣。”曰：“仁矣乎？”曰：“未知，焉得仁？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“很清高。”子张说：“算得上有仁德吗？”孔子说：“不知道，这怎么能算有仁德呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 季文子三思而后行，子闻之曰：“再斯可矣。”
conversation.output: 季文子每次做事的时候都要考虑很多次才行动。孔子听到了，说：“考虑两次就可以了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“宁武子，邦有道则知，邦无道则愚。其知可及也，其愚不可及也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“宁武子这个人，当国家政治清明时，他就显得聪明，当国家政治黑暗时，他就装得很愚笨。他的那种聪明别人可以做得到，他的那种装傻别人就做不到了。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子在陈，曰：“归与！归与！吾党之小子狂简，斐然成章，不知所以裁之。”
conversation.output: 孔子在陈国说：“回去吧！回去吧！家乡的那帮学生志向远大而行为粗疏；文采尚可但还不知道怎样来节制自己。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“伯夷、叔齐不念旧恶，怨是用希。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“伯夷、叔齐两个人不记往日仇怨，因此，别人对他们的怨恨也很少。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“孰谓微生高直？或乞醯焉，乞诸其邻而与之。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“谁说微生高这个人直率？有人向他讨点醋，他不直说没有，却暗地到他邻居家里讨了点给人家。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“巧言、令色、足恭，左丘明耻之，丘亦耻之。匿怨而友其人，左丘明耻之，丘亦耻之。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“花言巧语，表面伪善，用过分恭敬的态度接近别人，左丘明认为这种人可耻，我也这么认为。把仇恨藏在心里，表面上却装出友好的样子，左丘明认为这种人可耻，我也这样认为。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 颜渊、季路侍，子曰：“盍各言尔志？”子路曰：“愿车马、衣轻裘与朋友共，敝之而无憾。”颜渊曰：“愿无伐善，无施劳。”子路曰：“愿闻子之志。”子曰：“老者安之，朋友信之，少者怀之。”
conversation.output: 颜渊、子路两人侍立在孔子身边。孔子说：“你们何不说说各自的志向？”子路说：“我愿意拿出自己的车马、衣服，同我的朋友共同使用，就算用坏了也不抱怨。”颜渊说：“我愿意不夸耀自己的长处，不宣扬自己的功劳。”子路说：“我们希望听听老师的志向。”孔子说：“我愿老年人安度晚年，朋友之间相互信任，年幼的人得到照顾。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“已矣乎！吾未见能见其过而内自讼者也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“算了吧，我还没有看见过能够看到自己的错误便能自我责备的人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“十室之邑，必有忠信如丘者焉，不如丘之好学也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“即使只有十户人家的地方，也一定有像我这样讲忠信的人，只是赶不上我这样好学罢了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 卫灵公问陈于孔子，孔子对曰：“俎豆之事，则尝闻之矣；军旅之事，未之学也。”明日遂行。
conversation.output: 卫灵公向孔子询问排兵布阵的方法。孔子回答说：“祭祀礼仪方面的事情，我听说过；用兵打仗的事，从来没有学过。”第二天就离开了卫国。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 在陈绝粮，从者病莫能兴。子路愠见曰：“君子亦有穷乎？”子曰：“君子固穷，小人穷斯滥矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子在陈国断绝了粮食，跟从的人都饿病了，躺着不能起来。子路生气地来见孔子说：“君子也有困窘没有办法的时候吗？”孔子说：“君子在困窘时还能固守正道，小人一困窘就会胡作非为。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“赐也，女以予为多学而识之者与？”对曰：“然，非与？”曰：“非也，予一以贯之。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“赐啊！你以为我是多多学习并能记住所有知识的人吗？”子贡答道：“是啊，难道不是这样吗？”孔子说：“不是的。我是用一个基本的东西把它们贯彻始终的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“由，知德者鲜矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“由啊！懂得德的人太少了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“无为而治者其舜也与！夫何为哉？恭己正南面而已矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“能够不做什么就治理天下的人，大概只有舜吧？他做了些什么呢？他只是庄严端正地坐在朝廷的王位上罢了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张问行，子曰：“言忠信，行笃敬，虽蛮貊之邦行矣；言不忠信，行不笃敬，虽州里行乎哉？立则见其参于前也；在舆则见其倚于衡也，夫然后行。”子张书诸绅。
conversation.output: 子张问如何才能使自己到处都能行得通。孔子说：“言语忠实诚信，行为笃厚恭敬，即使到了蛮貊地区，也能行得通。言语不忠实诚信，行为不笃厚恭敬，即使是在本乡本土，能行得通吗？站立时，就好像看见‘忠实、诚信、笃厚、恭敬’的字样直立在面前；在车上时，就好像看见这几个字靠在车前横木上，这样才能处处行得通。”子张把这些话写在腰间的大带上。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“直哉史鱼！邦有道如矢，邦无道如矢。君子哉蘧伯玉！邦有道则仕，邦无道则可卷而怀之。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“史鱼真是正直啊！国家政治清明，他的言行像箭一样直；国家政治黑暗，他的言行也像箭一样直。蘧伯玉也真是一位君子啊！国家有道就出来做官，国家无道就（辞退官职）把自己的主张收藏在心里。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“可与言而不与之言，失人；不可与言而与之言，失言。知者不失人亦不失言。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“可以同他交谈却没有谈，这就是错失了人才；不可以同他交谈却要与他交谈，这就是说错了话。有智慧的人既不失去朋友，又不说错话。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“志士仁人无求生以害仁，有杀身以成仁。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“志士仁人决不为了自己活命而做出损害仁义的事情，而是宁可牺牲自己的性命来成全仁的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡问为仁，子曰：“工欲善其事，必先利其器。居是邦也，事其大夫之贤者，友其士之仁者。”
conversation.output: 子贡问怎样实行仁德。孔子说：“做工的人想把活儿做好，必须首先使他的工具锋利。住在这个国家，就要事奉大夫中的那些贤者，与士人中的仁者交朋友。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 颜渊问为邦，子曰：“行夏之时，乘殷之辂，服周之冕，乐则《韶》、《舞》；放郑声，远佞人。郑声淫，佞人殆。”
conversation.output: 颜渊问怎样治理国家。孔子说：“实行夏朝的历法，乘坐殷朝的车子，戴周朝的礼帽，音乐就用《韶》和《舞》，舍弃郑国的乐曲，远离谄媚的人。郑国的乐曲很淫秽，谄媚的人很危险。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“人无远虑，必有近忧。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“人如果一直没有长远的考虑，一定会有眼前的忧患。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“已矣乎！吾未见好德如好色者也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“罢了罢了！我从来没有见过喜欢美德如同喜欢美色一样的人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“臧文仲其窃位者与！知柳下惠之贤而不与立也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“臧文仲是一个偷窃官位的人！他明知道柳下惠具有贤能，却不举荐他一起做官。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“躬自厚而薄责于人，则远怨矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“人要能够自我反省，多责备自己而少责备别人，那就可以避免别人的怨恨了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“不曰‘如之何、如之何’者，吾末如之何也已矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不说‘怎么办，怎么办'的人，我对他也不知道该怎么办了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“群居终日，言不及义，好行小慧，难矣哉！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“整天聚在一块，谈话的内容丝毫不涉及道义，专好卖弄小聪明，这种人真难教导。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子义以为质，礼以行之，孙以出之，信以成之。君子哉！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子把义作为根本，用礼加以推行，用谦逊的语言表述，用诚信的态度来完成，这就是君子了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子病无能焉，不病人之不己知也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子担心自己没有才能，不担心别人不知道自己。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子疾没世而名不称焉。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子感到痛心的是到死而名声不被大家所称颂。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子求诸己，小人求诸人。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子要求的是自己，小人要求的是别人。“

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子矜而不争，群而不党。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子庄重而不与别人争执，合群而不结党营私。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子不以言举人，不以人废言。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子不因为一个人的话说得好就举荐他，也不因为一个人的德行不好就不采纳他的正确意见。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡问曰：“有一言而可以终身行之者乎？”子曰：“其恕乎！己所不欲，勿施于人。”
conversation.output: 子贡问孔子问道：“有没有一个字可以终身奉行的呢？”孔子回答说：“那就是恕吧！自己不愿意的，不要强加给别人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“吾之于人也，谁毁谁誉？如有所誉者，其有所试矣。斯民也，三代之所以直道而行也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我对于别人，毁谤了谁？赞誉了谁？如果有所赞誉的话，一定对他有所考察。有了这样的民众，夏、商、周三代所以能直道而行。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“吾犹及史之阙文也，有马者借人乘之，今亡矣夫！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我还能够看到史书中存疑空阙的地方。有马的人自己不会调教先借给别人骑，现在没有这样的了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“巧言乱德，小不忍，则乱大谋。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“花言巧语会败坏道德，小事情不忍耐，就会扰乱了大的谋略。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“众恶之，必察焉；众好之，必察焉。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“众人都厌恶他，不要轻易相信，要自己考察判断；大家都喜欢他，也一定要自己考察。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“人能弘道，非道弘人。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“人能不断使道得以完善，道却不能使人得以完善。。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“过而不改，是谓过矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“有了过错而不改正，这才是真的过错。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“吾尝终日不食、终夜不寝以思，无益，不如学也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我曾经整日不吃饭，整夜不睡觉，去思考问题，结果没有什么好处，还不如去学习为好。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子谋道不谋食。耕也馁在其中矣，学也禄在其中矣。君子忧道不忧贫。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子谋求的是道而不去谋求衣食。耕作，常常会有饥饿；学习，往往得到棒禄。君子担忧是否能学到道，不担忧贫穷。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“知及之，仁不能守之，虽得之，必失之；知及之，仁能守之，不庄以莅之，则民不敬；知及之，仁能守之，庄以莅之，动之不以礼，未善也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“靠聪明才智得到它，仁德不能守住它，即使得到了，也一定会丧失。靠聪明才智得到它，仁德能够守住它，但不以庄重的态度来行使职权，那么民众就不敬畏。靠聪明才智得到它，用仁德保持它，能以庄重的态度来行使职权，但不能按照礼来动员，也是不完善的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子不可小知而可大受也，小人不可大受而可小知也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子不能让他们做那些小事，但可以让他们承担重大的使命。小人不能让他们承担重大的使命，但可以让他们做那些小事。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“民之于仁也，甚于水火。水火，吾见蹈而死者矣，未见蹈仁而死者也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“老百姓对于仁的需要超过了对于水与火的需要。我只见过人跳到水火中而死的，却没有见过实行仁而死的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“当仁不让于师。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“担当实现仁道的重任，即使和老师相比，也不逊色。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子贞而不谅。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子固守正道，而不拘泥于小信。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“事君，敬其事而后其食。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“为君主办事，要认真办事而把自己的吃穿住行放在后边。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“有教无类。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“人人都可以接受教育，不分族类。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“道不同，不相为谋。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“志向不同的人，就不能在一起谋划。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“辞达而已矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“言辞只要把意思表达清楚了就行。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 师冕见，及阶，子曰：“阶也。”及席，子曰：“席也。”皆坐，子告之曰：“某在斯，某在斯。”师冕出。子张问曰：“与师言之道与？”子曰：“然，固相师之道也。”
conversation.output: 乐师冕来见孔子，走到台阶边，孔子说：“这儿是台阶。”走到坐席旁，孔子说：“这是坐席。”等大家都坐下来，孔子告诉他：“某某在这里，某某在这里。”师冕走了以后，子张就问孔子：“这就是与乐师谈话的道吗？”孔子说：“这就是帮助乐师的道。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张曰：“士见危致命，见得思义，祭思敬，丧思哀，其可已矣。”
conversation.output: 子张说：“士人遇见危险时肯献出自己的生命，看见有利可得时能考虑是否符合义的要求，祭祀时能想到是否严肃恭敬，居丧的时候想到自己是否哀伤，这样就可以了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张曰：“执德不弘，信道不笃，焉能为有？焉能为亡？”
conversation.output: 子张说：“实行德而不能发扬光大，信仰道而不忠实坚定，这样的人怎么能说有，又怎么说他没有？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏之门人问交于子张，子张曰：“子夏云何？”对曰：“子夏曰：‘可者与之，其不可者拒之。’”子张曰：“异乎吾所闻。君子尊贤而容众，嘉善而矜不能。我之大贤与，于人何所不容？我之不贤与，人将拒我，如之何其拒人也？”
conversation.output: 子夏的学生问子张应该怎么交朋友。子张说：“子夏是怎么说的？”答道：“子夏说：‘可以交往的就和他交朋友，不可以交往的就不和他交朋友。’”子张说：“这和我所听到的不一样！君子尊敬贤人，也能够容纳众人，称赞好人，怜悯无能的人。如果我是个很贤明的人，对别人有什么不能容纳的呢？如果我不贤明，别人将会拒绝我，我怎么能去拒绝别人呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏曰：“虽小道必有可观者焉，致远恐泥，是以君子不为也。”
conversation.output: 子夏说：“即使是小的技艺，也一定有可取之处，但对远大的事业恐怕就行不通了，所以君子不从事这些小技艺。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏曰：“日知其所亡，月无忘其所能，可谓好学也已矣。”
conversation.output: 子夏说：“每天能学到一些自己没有的知识，每月不忘自己已掌握的知识，这就可以叫做好学了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏曰：“博学而笃志，切问而近思，仁在其中矣。”
conversation.output: 子夏说：“博览群书并广泛学习，能坚守自己的志向，恳切地发问求教，多考虑当前的事情，仁德就在其中了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏曰：“百工居肆以成其事，君子学以致其道。”
conversation.output: 子夏说：“各行业的工匠要整天在作坊里完成自己分内的工作，君子要终身学习达到实现道的目的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏曰：“小人之过也必文。”
conversation.output: 子夏说：“小人犯了过错一定会加以掩饰。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏曰：“君子有三变：望之俨然，即之也温，听其言也厉。”
conversation.output: 子夏说：“君子会使人感到有三种变化：远远望去庄严可畏，接近他时却温和可亲，听他说话则严厉不苟。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏曰：“君子信而后劳其民，未信，则以为厉己也；信而后谏，未信，则以为谤己也。”
conversation.output: 子夏说：“君子在得到民众的信任之后才去役劳他们，没有得到信任就去役劳，民众就会认为是在虐害他们。君子得到君主的信任之后才去进谏，没有得到信任就去进谏，君主就会以为是在诽谤自己。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏曰：“大德不逾闲，小德出入可也。”
conversation.output: 子夏说：“大节上不能超越界限，小节上有些出入是可以的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子游曰：“子夏之门人小子，当洒扫应对进退则可矣。抑末也，本之则无，如之何？”
conversation.output: 子游说：“子夏的学生们，做洒水扫地、接待客人、趋进走退一类的事，是可以的，不过这些只是细枝末节的事。根本的学问却没有学到，这怎么行呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏闻之，曰：“噫，言游过矣！君子之道，孰先传焉？孰后倦焉？譬诸草木，区以别矣。君子之道焉可诬也？有始有卒者，其惟圣人乎！”
conversation.output: 子夏听了，说：“唉，子游错了。君子的学问，哪些先传授、哪些后传授，就好比草木一样，是区分为各种类别的。君子的学问，怎么能歪曲呢？有始有终地循序渐进，大概只有圣人吧！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏曰：“仕而优则学，学而优则仕。”
conversation.output: 子夏说：“做官之后还有余力的就可以去学习，学习学好了还有余力，就可以去做官以便给更好地推行仁道。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子游曰：“丧致乎哀而止。”
conversation.output: 子游说：“居丧，充分体现出悲哀之情就可以了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子游曰：“吾友张也为难能也，然而未仁。”
conversation.output: 子游说：“我的朋友子张可以说是难得的了，然而还没有做到仁。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曾子曰：“堂堂乎张也，难与并为仁矣。”
conversation.output: 曾子说：“子张外表堂堂，难于和他一起做到仁的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曾子曰：“吾闻诸夫子，人未有自致者也，必也亲丧乎！”
conversation.output: 曾子说：“我听老师曾经说过：人不可能自主地充分发挥感情， 如果有，一定是在父母死亡的时候。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曾子曰：“吾闻诸夫子，孟庄子之孝也，其他可能也；其不改父之臣与父之政，是难能也。”
conversation.output: 曾子说：“我听老师说过，孟庄子的孝，其他人也可以做到，但他不更换父亲的旧臣及其政治措施，这是别人难以做到的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孟氏使阳肤为士师，问于曾子。曾子曰：“上失其道，民散久矣。如得其情，则哀矜而勿喜！”
conversation.output: 孟氏任命阳肤做典狱官，阳肤向曾子请教。曾子说：“在上位的人丧失了正道，民心离散已经很久了。如果审案时审出真情，就应该悲哀怜悯，而不要沾沾自喜！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡曰：“纣之不善，不如是之甚也。是以君子恶居下流，天下之恶皆归焉。”
conversation.output: 子贡说：“纣王的坏，不像传说的那样厉害。因此，君子非常憎恶居于下流，一旦居于下流，天下的一切坏事坏名都会归到他的头上来。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
