conversation.input: 子贡曰：“君子之过也，如日月之食焉。过也，人皆见之；更也，人皆仰之。”
conversation.output: 子贡说：“君子的过错好像日食月食一样。有过错时，人们都看得见；改正过错的时候，人们都仰望着他。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 卫公孙朝问于子贡曰：“仲尼焉学？”子贡曰：“文武之道未坠于地，在人。贤者识其大者，不贤者识其小者，莫不有文武之道焉，夫子焉不学？而亦何常师之有？”
conversation.output: 卫国的公孙朝问子贡说：“仲尼的学问是从哪里学来的？”子贡说：“周文王和武王的道，并没有失传，还留在人间。贤能的人可以了解它的根本，不贤的人只记住了细枝末节，周文王和周武王之道是无处不在的。我们老师何处不学，又何必要有固定的老师传播呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 叔孙武叔语大夫于朝曰：“子贡贤于仲尼。”子服景伯以告子贡，子贡曰：“譬之宫墙，赐之墙也及肩，窥见室家之好；夫子之墙数仞，不得其门而入，不见宗庙之美、百官之富。得其门者或寡矣，夫子之云不亦宜乎！”
conversation.output: 叔孙武叔在朝廷上对大夫们说：“子贡比仲尼更有才能。”子服景伯把这一番话告诉了子贡。子贡说：“就用围墙作比喻吧，我家围墙只有齐肩高，从墙外可以看到里面房屋的美好。我老师的围墙有几仞高，找不到大门走进去，就看不见里面宗庙的雄美、房屋的富丽。能够找到门进去的人并不多。叔孙武叔那么讲，不也是很自然吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 叔孙武叔毁仲尼，子贡曰：“无以为也，仲尼不可毁也。他人之贤者，丘陵也，犹可逾也；仲尼，日月也，无得而逾焉。人虽欲自绝，其何伤于日月乎？多见其不知量也。”
conversation.output: 叔孙武叔诽谤仲尼。子贡说：“这样做是没有用的！仲尼是毁谤不了的。别人的贤德好比丘陵，还可超越过去，仲尼的贤德好比太阳和月亮，是无法超越的。虽然有人要自绝于日月，对日月又有什么损害呢？只是表明他不自量力而已。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 陈子禽谓子贡曰：“子为恭也，仲尼岂贤于子乎？”子贡曰：“君子一言以为知，一言以为不知，言不可不慎也。夫子之不可及也，犹天之不可阶而升也。夫子之得邦家者，所谓立之斯立，道之斯行，绥之斯来，动之斯和。其生也荣，其死也哀，如之何其可及也？”
conversation.output: 陈子禽对子贡说：“你太谦恭了，仲尼岂能比你更有才能？”子贡说：“君子的一句话就可以表现他的智识，一句话也可以表现他的不智，所以说话不可以不慎重。夫子的高不可及，正像天是不能够顺着梯子爬上去一样。假如老师得到国家去治理的话，说要立于礼，百姓就立于礼；引导百姓，百姓就跟着实行；安抚百姓，百姓就会来归服；动员百姓，百姓就会协力同心。他活着时荣耀，死了令人哀痛，别人怎么可能赶得上他呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子罕言利与命与仁。
conversation.output: 孔子很少谈到利益，却相信天命、赞许仁德。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 达巷党人曰：“大哉孔子！博学而无所成名。”子闻之，谓门弟子曰：“吾何执？执御乎，执射乎？吾执御矣。”
conversation.output: 达巷党这个地方有人说：“孔子真是伟大啊！他学识渊博，可惜没有使他树立名声的专长。”孔子听说了，对他的学生说：“我应该要做什么好呢？是去驾车呢？还是射箭呢？我还是去驾车吧。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“麻冕，礼也；今也纯，俭，吾从众。拜下，礼也；今拜乎上，泰也；虽违众，吾从下。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“用麻线来做礼帽，这是合乎礼的；如今用丝来制作礼帽，这样省俭些，我赞成大家的做法。臣见君，先在堂下磕头，然后升堂磕头，这是合乎礼节的；现在大家都只是升堂磕头，这是倨傲的表现。虽然违反了大家的做法，我还是主张要先在堂下磕头。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子绝四：毋意、毋必、毋固、毋我。
conversation.output: 孔子杜绝了四种弊病：不凭空猜疑，不绝对偏执，不拘泥固执，不惟我独尊。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子畏于匡，曰：“文王既没，文不在兹乎？天之将丧斯文也，后死者不得与于斯文也；天之未丧斯文也，匡人其如予何？”
conversation.output: 孔子在匡地被人们围困时，他说：“周文王死了以后，周代的礼乐文化不是保存在我这里吗？上天如果想要消灭这种文化，那我就不可能掌握这种文化了；上天如果不想灭除这种文明礼乐，匡地的人能把我怎么样呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 太宰问于子贡曰：“夫子圣者与，何其多能也？”子贡曰：“固天纵之将圣，又多能也。”子闻之，曰：“太宰知我乎？吾少也贱，故多能鄙事。君子多乎哉？不多也。”
conversation.output: 太宰问子贡说：“孔夫子是圣人吗？为什么他如此博学多才呢？”子贡说：“这本是上天想让他成为圣人，所以使他博学多才。”孔子听到后说：“太宰怎么会了解我呢？我小时候生活艰难，所以会做很多粗活。君子会有这么多的技艺吗？不会有很多的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 牢曰：“子云：‘吾不试，故艺。’”
conversation.output: 子牢说：“孔子说过，‘我年轻时没有去做官，所以会许多技艺’。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“吾有知乎哉？无知也。有鄙夫问于我，空空如也。我叩其两端而竭焉。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我有知识吗？也会有没有知识的时候。曾经有个乡下人向我提问，我对他的问题无以应答，只有尽可能拉近与他的距离，站在两个人共同对于事件问题的立场上而做到能够完全理解认识问题和知识为止。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“凤鸟不至，河不出图，吾已矣夫！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“凤凰不来了，黄河中也不出现八卦图了。我这一生也就完了吧！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子见齐衰者、冕衣裳者与瞽者，见之，虽少，必作，过之必趋。
conversation.output: 孔子对于穿丧服的人、穿礼服戴礼帽的人和盲人，相见的时候，哪怕他们很年轻，也一定会站起身来；经过这些人身边时，他一定快步走过。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 颜渊喟然叹曰：“仰之弥高，钻之弥坚。瞻之在前，忽焉在后。夫子循循然善诱人，博我以文，约我以礼，欲罢不能。既竭吾才，如有所立卓尔，虽欲从之，末由也已。”
conversation.output: 颜渊感叹地说：“对于老师的知识与道德，愈仰望愈觉得其崇高；越钻研越觉得其艰深。看它好像在前面，忽然间又像在后面。老师善于有步骤地引导我们，用各种文献来丰富我们的知识，用礼来约束我们的行为，我们想要停止学习都不可能。我已经竭尽全力，但它仍在面前高高地耸立着，虽想攀从，却觉无路可走。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子疾病，子路使门人为臣。病间，曰：“久矣哉，由之行诈也！无臣而为有臣，吾谁欺？欺天乎？且予与其死于臣之手也，无宁死于二三子之手乎！且予纵不得大葬，予死于道路乎？”
conversation.output: 孔子生了重病，子路让孔子的门徒充当家臣准备料理丧事。后来，孔子的病好了一些，他说：“仲由很久以来就干这种弄虚作假的事情。仲由做这种欺诈的事情很久啦！我没有家臣而冒充有家臣。我骗谁呢？骗上天吧？与其在家臣的侍候下死去，我宁可在你们这些学生的侍候下死去，这样不是更好吗？而且即使我不能以大夫之礼来安葬，难道会死在路上吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡曰：“有美玉于斯，韫椟而藏诸？求善贾而沽诸？”子曰：“沽之哉，沽之哉！我待贾者也。”
conversation.output: 子贡说：“这里有一块美玉，是藏在柜子里呢？还是寻求那些识货的商人把它卖掉呢？”孔子回答说：“卖掉吧，卖掉吧！我是等待着那些识货的人来，等到那些真正认得美玉的人来买啊。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子欲居九夷。或曰：“陋，如之何？”子曰：“君子居之，何陋之有！”
conversation.output: 孔子想要搬到九夷地方去居住。有人说：“那里非常落后闭塞，怎么能住呢？”孔子说：“有君子住在那儿，怎么会鄙陋呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“吾自卫反鲁，然后乐正，《雅》、《颂》各得其所。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我从卫国回到鲁国以后，才把音乐进行了整理，《雅》和《颂》都有了适当的位置。。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“出则事公卿，入则事父兄，丧事不敢不勉，不为酒困，何有于我哉？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“在外便侍公卿，入门便侍奉父兄，有丧事，不敢不勉力去办，不被酒所困扰，这些事我做到了哪些呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子在川上曰：“逝者如斯夫！不舍昼夜。”
conversation.output: 孔子在河边说：“时间就像这奔流的河水一样，不分白天黑夜不停地流逝。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“吾未见好德如好色者也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我没有见过像好色那样好德的人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“譬如为山，未成一篑，止，吾止也；譬如平地，虽覆一篑，进，吾往也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“比如用土堆山，只差一筐土就完成了，这时候停下来，那是我自己要停下来的；比如在平地上堆山，虽然只倒下一筐，如果决心继续，还是要自己去干的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“语之而不惰者，其回也与！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“听我说话而能毫不懈怠的，只有颜回一个人吧！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子谓颜渊，曰：“惜乎！吾见其进也，未见其止也。”
conversation.output: 孔子对颜渊说：“可惜呀！我只见他不断前进，从来没有看见他停止过。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“苗而不秀者有矣夫，秀而不实者有矣夫。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“庄稼有只长苗而不开花的吧！有开了花却不结果实的吧。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“后生可畏，焉知来者之不如今也？四十、五十而无闻焉，斯亦不足畏也已。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“年轻人是可敬畏的，怎么知道他们将来赶不上现在的人呢？一个人如果到了四五十岁的时候还没有什么名望，这样的人也就不值得敬畏了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“法语之言，能无从乎？改之为贵。巽与之言，能无说乎？绎之为贵。说而不绎，从而不改，吾末如之何也已矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“合乎礼法原则的话，能够不听从吗？但只有按它来改正错误才是可贵的。恭顺赞许的话，听了能够不高兴吗？但只有分析鉴别以后才是可贵的。只顾高兴而不加以分析，表面听从而不加以改正，我也没有什么办法来对付这种人了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“主忠信。毋友不如己者，过，则勿惮改。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子应该亲近忠诚和讲信义的人，不要和不如自己的人交朋友，有了过错不要害怕改正。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“三军可夺帅也，匹夫不可夺志也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“军队的首领可以被改变，但是有志气的人的志向是不能被改变的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“衣敝缊袍，与衣狐貉者立而不耻者，其由也与！‘不忮不求，何用不臧？’”子路终身诵之，子曰：“是道也，何足以臧？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“穿着破旧的丝棉袍子，与穿着狐貉裘皮衣服的人站在一起而不觉得羞耻，大概只有仲由吧。《诗经》上说：‘不嫉妒，不贪求，为什么说不好呢？’”子路听了，从此常常念着这句话。孔子又说：“仅仅做到这个样子，又怎么算得上好呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“岁寒，然后知松柏之后凋也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“到了一年中寒冷的季节，才知道松树和柏树是最后凋谢的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“知者不惑，仁者不忧，勇者不惧。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不断求取知识的人就不会被遇到的事情所迷惑；真诚的待人如己，以至于不在为个人得失而忧愁；勇敢的实践前行以至于不在畏惧任何困难。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“可与共学，未可与适道；可与适道，未可与立；可与立，未可与权。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“可以一起学习的人，未必能走共同的道路；能走共同的道路的人，未必可以和他事事依礼而行；可以和他事事依礼而行，未必可以和他一起变通灵活处事。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: “唐棣之华，偏其反而。岂不尔思？室是远尔。”子曰：“未之思也，夫何远之有。”
conversation.output: 古代有一首诗这样写道：“唐棣树的花，翩翩地摇摆，难道不思念你吗？只是由于家住的地方太远了。”孔子说：“他还是没有真的想念，如果真的想念，有什么觉得遥远呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路问政，子曰：“先之，劳之。”请益，曰：“无倦。”
conversation.output: 子路问为政之道。孔子说：“自己先要身体力行带好头，然后让老百姓辛勤劳作。”子路请求多讲一些，孔子说：“不要倦怠。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 仲弓为季氏宰，问政，子曰：“先有司，赦小过，举贤才。”曰：“焉知贤才而举之？”曰：“举尔所知。尔所不知，人其舍诸？”
conversation.output: 仲弓做了季氏的家臣，询问怎么管理政事。孔子说：“先责成手下负责具体事务的官吏，让他们各负其责，赦免他们的小过错，提拔贤能的人。”仲弓又问：“怎样才能知道哪些人是贤才并把他们选拔出来呢？”孔子说：“选拔你所知道的，那些你所不知道的，别人难道会埋没他吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路曰：“卫君待子而为政，子将奚先？”
conversation.output: 子路说：“卫君等待老师去治理国政,老师打算先从哪儿入手呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“必也正名乎！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“必须辨正名称!”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路曰：“有是哉，子之迂也！奚其正？”
conversation.output: 子路说：“有这个必要吗？老师绕得太远了！辨正它们干什么呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“野哉由也！君子于其所不知，盖阙如也。名不正，则言不顺；言不顺，则事不成；事不成，则礼乐不兴；礼乐不兴，则刑罚不中；刑罚不中，则民无所措手足。故君子名之必可言也，言之必可行也。君子于其言，无所苟而已矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“仲由，真是鲁莽啊。君子对于自己所不知道的，总是采取存疑的态度。名分不正，说起话来就不顺当合理，说话不顺当合理，事情就办不成。事情办不成，礼乐也就不能兴盛。礼乐不能兴盛，刑罚的执行就不会得当。刑罚不得当，百姓就不知怎么办好。所以，君子一定要定下一个名分，必须能够说得明白，说出来一定能够行得通。君子对于自己的言行，是从来不马虎对待的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 樊迟请学稼，子曰：“吾不如老农。”
conversation.output: 樊迟向孔子请教学习种庄稼。孔子说：“我不如有经验的老农。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 请学为圃，曰：“吾不如老圃。”
conversation.output: 樊迟又请教学习种菜。孔子说：“我不如有经验的种菜老农。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 樊迟出，子曰：“小人哉樊须也！上好礼，则民莫敢不敬；上好义，则民莫敢不服；上好信，则民莫敢不用情。夫如是，则四方之民襁负其子而至矣，焉用稼？”
conversation.output: 樊迟出去后，孔子说：“樊迟这人真是小人。居于上位的人爱好礼仪，老百姓就没有敢不恭敬的；居于上位的人爱好道义，老百姓就没有敢不服从的；居于上位的人爱好诚信，老百姓就没有敢不诚实的。如果做到了这一点，四面八方的老百姓就会背着自己的小孩来投奔，哪里还需要自己去种庄稼呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“诵《诗》三百，授之以政，不达；使于四方，不能专对；虽多，亦奚以为？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“熟读了《诗经》三百篇，交给他政务，他却搞不懂；派他出使到四方各国，又不能独立应对外交。虽然读书多，又有什么用处呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“其身正，不令而行；其身不正，虽令不从。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“自身端正，不用命令人们就会遵行；自身不端正，虽发命令也没有人听从。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“鲁卫之政，兄弟也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“鲁国的政事和卫国的政事，像兄弟一样。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子谓卫公子荆，“善居室。始有，曰：‘苟合矣。’少有，曰：‘苟完矣。’富有，曰：‘苟美矣。’”
conversation.output: 孔子谈到卫国的公子荆时说：“他善于治理家政。当他刚开始有财物时，便说：‘差不多够了。’当稍微多起来时，就说：‘将要足够了。’稍为多一点时，他说：‘差不多就算完备了。’更多一点时，他说：‘差不多算是完美了’。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子适卫，冉有仆，子曰：“庶矣哉！”冉有曰：“既庶矣，又何加焉？”曰：“富之。”曰：“既富矣，又何加焉？”曰：“教之。”
conversation.output: 孔子到卫国去，冉有给他驾车。孔子说：“真是人口众多啊！”冉有说：“人口已经很多了，还要再做什么呢？”孔子说：“让他们富裕起来。”冉有说：“富裕起来后又要做些什么？”孔子说：“对他们进行教化。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“苟有用我者，期月而已可也，三年有成。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“假如有人用我主持国家政事，一年之内就可以见到成效了，三年便能成效显著。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“‘善人为邦百年，亦可以胜残去杀矣。’诚哉是言也！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“善人治国百年，也就可以消除残暴，废除刑罚杀戮了。这句话说得真对呀！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“如有王者，必世而后仁。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“建立一个新的国家，也必须经过三十年才能实现仁政，走上正规发展道路。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“苟正其身矣，于从政乎何有？不能正其身，如正人何？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“如果端正了自身的言行，治理国家还有什么困难呢？如果不能端正自身的言行，又怎么去让别人端正呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 冉子退朝，子曰：“何晏也？”对曰：“有政。”子曰：“其事也。如有政，虽不吾以，吾其与闻之。”
conversation.output: 冉求退朝回来，孔子说：“为什么这么晚？”冉求说：“有政事。”孔子说：“那不过是一般性的事务罢了。如果是重要的政务，即使不用我，我还是会知道的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 定公问：“一言而可以兴邦，有诸？”
conversation.output: 鲁定公问：“一句话就可以使国家兴盛，有这样的话吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子对曰：“言不可以若是，其几也。人之言曰：‘为君难，为臣不易。’如知为君之难也，不几乎一言而兴邦乎？”
conversation.output: 孔子答道：“不可能有这样的话，但有近乎于这样的话。有人说：‘做君难，做臣不易。’如果知道了做君的难，这不近乎于一句话可以使国家兴盛吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曰：“一言而丧邦，有诸？”
conversation.output: 鲁定公又问：“一句话可以亡国，有这样的话吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子对曰：“言不可以若是其几也。人之言曰：‘予无乐乎为君，唯其言而莫予违也。’如其善而莫之违也，不亦善乎？如不善而莫之违也，不几乎一言而丧邦乎？”
conversation.output: 孔子回答说：“不可能有这样的话，但有近乎这样的话。有人说过：‘我做君主并没有什么可高兴的，我所高兴的只在于我所说的话没有人敢于违抗。’如果说得对而没有人违抗，不也好吗？如果说得不对而没有人违抗，那不就近乎于一句话可以亡国吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 叶公问政，子曰：“近者说，远者来。”
conversation.output: 叶公问孔子怎样管理政事。孔子说：“使近处的人快乐满意，使远方的人慕名而来。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏为莒父宰，问政，子曰：“无欲速，无见小利。欲速则不达，见小利则大事不成。”
conversation.output: 子夏做了莒父地方的长官，问孔子怎样处理政事。孔子说：“做事不要图快，不要只见眼前小利，如果只图快，结果反到达不到目的；只图小利，就办不成大事。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 叶公语孔子曰：“吾党有直躬者，其父攘羊，而子证之。”孔子曰：“吾党之直者异于是。父为子隐，子为父隐，直在其中矣。”
conversation.output: 叶公告诉孔子说：“我的家乡有个正直的人，他的父亲偷了别人的羊，他就将他的父亲告发了。”孔子说：“我家乡的正直的人和你讲的正直人不一样：父亲为儿子隐瞒，儿子为父亲隐瞒。正直就在其中了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 樊迟问仁，子曰：“居处恭，执事敬，与人忠。虽之夷狄，不可弃也。”
conversation.output: 樊迟问怎样才是仁。孔子说：“平时的生活起居要端庄恭敬，办事情的时候严肃认真，对待他人要忠诚。就是去边远的少数民族居庄的地方，也是不能废弃这些原则的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡问曰：“何如斯可谓之士矣？”子曰：“行己有耻，使于四方不辱君命，可谓士矣。”曰：“敢问其次。”曰：“宗族称孝焉，乡党称弟焉。”曰：“敢问其次。”曰：“言必信，行必果，硁硁然小人哉！抑亦可以为次矣。”曰：“今之从政者何如？”子曰：“噫！斗筲之人，何足算也！”
conversation.output: 子贡问道：“怎样才可称得上‘士’呢？”孔子说：“能用羞耻之心约束自己的行为，出使不辜负君主的委托，这就可以称作‘士’了。”子贡说：“请问次一等的‘士’是什么样的？”孔子说：宗族的人称赞他孝顺，乡里的人称赞他友爱。”子贡说：“请问再次一等的‘士’是什么样的？”孔子说：“说话一定要诚信，做事一定要坚定果断，这虽是耿直固执的小人，但也可以算是再次一等的‘士’了。”子贡说：“现在的执政者，您看怎么样？”孔子说：“唉！这些器量狭小的人，哪里能数得上呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“不得中行而与之，必也狂狷乎！狂者进取，狷者有所不为也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“找不到行为合乎中庸的人而和他们交往，一定只能和勇于向前及洁身自好的人交往！狂者敢作敢为，狷者对有些事是不肯干的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“南人有言曰：‘人而无恒，不可以作巫医。’善夫！”“不恒其德，或承之羞。”子曰：“不占而已矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“南方人有句话说：‘人如果没有恒心，就不能当巫医。’这句话说得真好啊！”！”《周易》说：“人不能长期坚持自己的德行，有时候就会遭受羞辱。”孔子说：“这句话是说，没有恒心的人用不着去占卦了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子和而不同，小人同而不和。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子可以与他周围保持和谐融洽的氛围，但他对待任何事情都持有自己的独立见解，而不是人云亦云，盲目附和；小人则没有自己独立的见解，虽然常和他人保持一致，但实际并不讲求真正的和谐贯通。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡问曰：“乡人皆好之，何如？”子曰：“未可也。”“乡人皆恶之，何如？”子曰：“未可也。不如乡人之善者好之，其不善者恶之。”
conversation.output: 子贡问孔子说：“乡里人都喜欢他，那这个人怎么样？”孔子说：“这还不能肯定。”子贡又问孔子说：“乡里人都很厌恶他，那这个人怎么样？”孔子说：“这也是不能肯定的。最好的人是全乡的好人都喜欢他，全乡的坏人都厌恶他。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子易事而难说也，说之不以道不说也，及其使人也器之；小人难事而易说也，说之虽不以道说也，及其使人也求备焉。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“为君子办事很容易，但是不容易讨他欢心。如果讨他欢心不按照自己的准则，不做好自己的本分，肯定不会成功讨他欢心；但是当君子任用人才的时候，会很器重你。为小人办事很难，但要取得他的欢喜则是很容易的。即使没有按照自己的原则，没有做好自己的本分，这样去讨他欢心，他也会很高兴。但等到他真正使用人的时候，却只会求全责备。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子泰而不骄，小人骄而不泰。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子舒泰自如而不骄矜凌人，小人傲慢无礼而不舒泰自如。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“刚、毅、木、讷近仁。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“一个人如果具有刚强、坚毅、朴实、慎言，这四种品德就接近于仁人了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路问曰：“何如斯可谓之士矣？”子曰：“切切偲偲，怡怡如也，可谓士矣。朋友切切偲偲，兄弟怡怡。”
conversation.output: 子路问孔子道：“怎样才可以称为士呢？”孔子说：“互相帮助督促而又和睦相处，就可以叫作士了。朋友之间互相勉励督促，兄弟之间和睦相处。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“善人教民七年，亦可以即戎矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“善人在位教化百姓七年，也能让他们去战场作战了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“以不教民战，是谓弃之。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“如果用没有经过军事训练的老百姓去打仗，这就是让他们去送死。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 季氏将伐颛臾，冉有、季路见于孔子，曰：“季氏将有事于颛臾。”
conversation.output: 季氏将要讨伐颛臾。冉有、子路去拜见孔子说：“季氏准备攻打颛臾了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“求，无乃尔是过与？夫颛臾，昔者先王以为东蒙主，且在邦域之中矣，是社稷之臣也。何以伐为？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“冉求，这难道不是你的过错吗？颛臾从前是周天子让它主持东蒙的祭祀的，而且已经在鲁国的疆域之内，是国家的臣属啊，为什么要讨伐它呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 冉有曰：“夫子欲之，吾二臣者皆不欲也。”
conversation.output: 冉有说：“季孙大夫想去攻打，我们两个人都不愿意。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“求，周任有言曰：‘陈力就列，不能者止。’危而不持，颠而不扶，则将焉用彼相矣？且尔言过矣，虎兕出于柙，圭玉毁于椟中，是谁之过与？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“冉求，周任有句话说：‘尽自己的力量去负担你的职务，实在做不好就辞职。’有了危险不去扶助，跌倒了不去搀扶，那还用辅助的人干什么呢？而且你说的话错了。老虎、犀牛从笼子里跑出来，龟甲、玉器在匣子里毁坏了，这是谁的过错呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 冉有曰：“今夫颛臾固而近于费，今不取，后世必为子孙忧。”
conversation.output: 冉有说：“现在颛臾城墙坚固，而且离费邑很近。现在不把它夺取过来，将来一定会成为子孙的忧患。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“求，君子疾夫舍曰欲之而必为之辞。丘也闻，有国有家者，不患寡而患不均，不患贫而患不安。
conversation.output: 孔子说：“冉求！君子痛恨那些不说自己想那样做却一定要另找借口的人。我听说，对于诸侯和大夫，不怕贫穷而怕财富不均；不怕人口少而怕不安定。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 盖均无贫，和无寡，安无倾。夫如是，故远人不服则修文德以来之，既来之，则安之。今由与求也相夫子，远人不服而不能来也，邦分崩离析而不能守也，而谋动干戈于邦内。吾恐季孙之忧不在颛臾，而在萧墙之内也。”
conversation.output: 因为财富均衡就没有贫穷，和睦团结就不觉得人口少，境内安定就不会有倾覆的危险。像这样做，远方的人还不归服，那就再修仁义礼乐的政教来招致他们。他们来归服了，就让他们安心生活。现在，仲由和冉求你们辅佐季孙，远方的人不归服却又不能招致他们；国家分崩离析却不能保全守住；反而谋划在国内动用武力。我恐怕季孙的忧患不在颛臾，而在他自己的宫墙之内呢！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“天下有道，则礼乐征伐自天子出；天下无道，则礼乐征伐自诸侯出。自诸侯出，盖十世希不失矣；自大夫出，五世希不失矣；陪臣执国命，三世希不失矣。天下有道，则政不在大夫；天下有道，则庶人不议。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“世道清明，那么制作礼乐和发令征伐的权力都出自天子。世道混乱，那么制作礼乐和发令征伐的权力都出自诸侯。由诸侯作主决定，大概经过十代很少有不垮台的；由大夫决定，经过五代很少有不垮台的。天下有道，国家政权就不会落在大夫手中。天下有道，老百姓也就不会议论国家政治了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“禄之去公室五世矣，政逮于大夫四世矣，故夫三桓之子孙微矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“鲁国王室失去国家政权已经有五代了，政权落在大夫之手已经四代了，所以鲁桓公的三家子孙都衰微了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“益者三友，损者三友。友直、友谅、友多闻，益矣；友便辟、友善柔、友便佞，损矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“有益的朋友有三种，有害的朋友有三种。与正直的人交朋友，与诚实的人交朋友，与见多识广的人交朋友，是有益处的。与走歪门邪道的人交朋友，与谗媚奉迎的人交朋友，与花言巧语的人交朋友，是有害的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“益者三乐，损者三乐。乐节礼乐、乐道人之善、乐多贤友，益矣；乐骄乐、乐佚游、乐宴乐，损矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“使人受益的有三种爱好，使人受损的也有三种爱好。爱好行事以礼乐为节度，爱好称道别人的优点，爱好多结交有贤德的朋友，都会受益；爱好骄矜傲慢，爱好闲散游荡，爱好沉迷酒食，都会受损。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“侍于君子有三愆：言未及之而言谓之躁，言及之而不言谓之隐，未见颜色而言谓之瞽。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“侍奉在君子旁边陪他说话，要注意避免犯三种过失：话没有轮到他说却说了，这是急躁；话轮到他说却不说，这叫隐瞒；未曾察言观色就开口，这是瞎子。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“君子有三戒：少之时，血气未定，戒之在色；及其壮也，血气方刚，戒之在斗；及其老也，血气既衰，戒之在得。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子有三种戒忌：年少时，血气不定，要戒除女色；等到到壮年了，血气方刚，需要戒除善斗的心理；等到到老年的时候，血气衰弱了，要戒贪。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“君子有三畏：畏天命，畏大人，畏圣人之言。小人不知天命而不畏也，狎大人，侮圣人之言。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子有三种敬畏：敬畏天命，敬畏王公大人，敬畏圣人的言论。小人不知道天命不可违抗，所以不敬畏它，轻视王公大人，侮慢圣人的言论。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“生而知之者上也，学而知之者次也；困而学之又其次也。困而不学，民斯为下矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“生来就知道的，是上等；经过学习后才知道的，是次等；遇到困惑疑难才去学习的，是又次一等了；遇到困惑疑难仍不去学习的，这种老百姓就是下等的了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“君子有九思：视思明，听思聪，色思温，貌思恭，言思忠，事思敬，疑思问，忿思难，见得思义。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子有九种思考：看的时候要思考看明白了没，听的时要思考听清楚了没，待人接物时，要想想脸色是否温和，样貌是否恭敬，说话时要想想是否忠实，做事时要想想是否严肃认真，有疑难时要想着询问，气愤发怒时要想想可能产生的后患，看见可得的要想想是否合于义。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“见善如不及，见不善如探汤；吾见其人矣。吾闻其语矣。隐居以求其志，行义以达其道；吾闻其语矣，未见其人也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“看到善良的行为，就担心达不到，看到不善良的行动，就好像把手伸到开水中一样赶快避开。我见到过这样的人，也听到过这样的话。以隐居避世来保全自己的志向，依照义而贯彻自己的主张。我听到过这种话，却没有见到过这样的人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 齐景公有马千驷，死之日，民无德而称焉；伯夷、叔齐饿于首阳之下，民到于今称之。其斯之谓与？”
conversation.output: 齐景公有四千匹马，他去世的时候，百姓们觉得他没有什么德行可以称颂。伯夷、叔齐饿死在首阳山下，百姓们到现在还在称颂他们。说的就是这个意思吧。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 陈亢问于伯鱼曰：“子亦有异闻乎？”对曰：“未也。尝独立，鲤趋而过庭，曰：‘学《诗》乎？’对曰：‘未也。’‘不学《诗》，无以言。’鲤退而学《诗》。
conversation.output: 陈亢问伯鱼：“你在老师那里有得到与众不同的教诲吗？”伯鱼回答说：没有。他曾经独自站在那里，我快步走过庭中，他说：‘学《诗》了吗？’我回答说：‘没有。’他说：不学《诗》就不会应对说话。‘我退回后就学《诗》。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 他日，又独立，鲤趋而过庭，曰：‘学《礼》乎？’对曰：‘未也。’‘不学《礼》，无以立。’鲤退而学《礼》。闻斯二者。”陈亢退而喜曰：“问一得三，闻《诗》，闻《礼》，又闻君子之远其子也。”
conversation.output: 另一天，他又独自一人站着，我快步走过庭中，他说：‘学《礼》了吗？’我回答说：‘没有。’他说：‘不学礼就不懂得怎样立身。’我回去就学礼。我就听到过这两件事。”陈亢回去高兴地说：“我提一个问题，得到三方面的收获，听了关于《诗》的道理，听了关于礼的道理，又听了君子不偏爱自己儿子的道理。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 邦君之妻，君称之曰夫人，夫人自称曰小童；邦人称之曰君夫人，称诸异邦曰寡小君；异邦人称之亦曰君夫人。
conversation.output: 国君的妻子，国君称她为夫人，夫人自称为小童，国人称她为君夫人；对他国人则称她为寡小君，他国人也称她为君夫人。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“学而时习之，不亦说乎？有朋自远方来，不亦乐乎？人不知而不愠，不亦君子乎？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“学了知识然后按一定的时间复习它，不也是很愉快吗？有志同道合的人从远方来，不也是很快乐吗？人家不了解我，我也不生气，不也是品德上有修养的人吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 有子曰：“其为人也孝弟，而好犯上者，鲜矣；不好犯上而好作乱者，未之有也。君子务本，本立而道生。孝弟也者，其为仁之本与！”
conversation.output: 有子说：“一个人如果能够孝顺父母，友爱兄长，还喜欢犯上作乱，这是基本不可能。不喜欢犯上作乱，而喜欢造反的人是没有的。君子应该专心于根本的事务，根本建立了，治国做人的原则也就有了。孝悌，就是人的根本！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“巧言令色，鲜矣仁！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“花言巧语，满脸谄媚之色的人，很少会有仁爱之心。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曾子曰：“吾日三省吾身：为人谋而不忠乎？与朋友交而不信乎？传不习乎？”
conversation.output: 曾子说：“我每天多次地反省自己：替别人办事是不是尽心尽力呢 ？跟朋友交往是不是真诚，诚实呢？ 老师传授的知识是否复习过了呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“道千乘之国，敬事而信，节用而爱人，使民以时。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“治理一个拥有千辆兵车的大国，就应该谨慎地处理国家大事而又恪守信用，诚实无欺，节约财政开支爱惜民力，适时征发力役，应不违农时。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“弟子入则孝，出则弟，谨而信，泛爱众，而亲仁，行有余力，则以学文。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“弟子们在家里就要孝顺父母，出门在外，要顺从师长，言行要谨慎，要诚实可信，寡言少语，要博爱大众，亲近仁德的人。这样亲身实践之后，如果还有剩余的时间跟精力，就再去学习文献知识。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子夏曰：“贤贤易色；事父母，能竭其力；事君，能致其身；与朋友交，言而有信。虽曰未学，吾必谓之学矣。”
conversation.output: 子夏说：“一个人能够看重贤德而不以容貌为重；侍奉父母，能够竭尽全力；服侍君主，能够献出自己的生命；跟朋友来往，能够说话诚实恪守信用。这样的人，尽管他自己谦虚说没有学习，我也一定说他已经学习过了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子不重则不威，学则不固。主忠信，无友不如己者，过，则勿惮改。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子举止不庄重，就没有威严，即使读书，学习的知识也不会牢固。做事应该以忠和信这两种道德为主，不要和不忠不信的人交朋友；犯了错，就不要怕改正。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曾子曰：“慎终追远，民德归厚矣。”
conversation.output: 曾子说：“谨慎的思考人生于天地之间的意义，看看老祖宗们都留下了些什么，在自身与先贤之间做一个对比，应效法先古圣贤。每个人都这样的去思考，人民的道德就自然敦厚了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子禽问于子贡曰：“夫子至于是邦也，必闻其政，求之与，抑与之与？”子贡曰：“夫子温、良、恭、俭、让以得之。夫子之求之也，其诸异乎人之求之与？”
conversation.output: 子禽问子贡说：“老师去到一个国家，就会知道这个国家的政事。这种事情是他自己求得的呢？还是各个国家的国君主动以自己国家的政事咨询，亲口告诉他的呢？”子贡说：“老师是靠温和、善良、恭敬、节俭、谦逊来取得他们的信任。他老人家参与政事的方式，大概与别人不同吧！

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“父在，观其志；父没，观其行；三年无改于父之道，可谓孝矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说；“当他父亲还活着时，要观察他的志向；在他父亲去世以后，要观察他的行为；若是他能长久的坚持父亲生前正确的原则，这样的人就可以说是尽到孝了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 有子曰：“礼之用，和为贵。先王之道，斯为美。小大由之。有所不行。知和而和，不以礼节之，亦不可行也。”
conversation.output: 有子说：“礼的作用，在于使人的关系变得更加和谐。古代君王治国的方法，宝贵的地方就在这里。但是不论大小事情一味按和谐的办法去做，有的时候又行不通。这是因为为了和谐而和谐，不用礼来节制和谐，也是行不通的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 有子曰：“信近于义，言可复也。恭近于礼，远耻辱也。因不失其亲，亦可宗也。”
conversation.output: 有子说：“讲究信用而合乎事实，说过的话是可以得到实践的；恭敬而能合乎礼节，这样才能远离耻辱。所以依靠的都是可以信赖的人，这样也是值得尊敬的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子食无求饱，居无求安，敏于事而慎于言，就有道而正焉。可谓好学也已。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子，不追求饮食的饱足，不追求居住的舒适，做事情勤劳敏捷，说话小心谨慎，亲近有德之人来匡正自己，这样就算得上好学了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡曰：“贫而无谄，富而无骄，何如？”
conversation.output: 子贡说：“贫穷却不巴结奉承，富有却不骄傲自大，怎么样？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“可也。未若贫而乐，富而好礼者也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“这样可以算不错了。只是还不如虽贫穷却乐于道，虽然富裕却又好礼的人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡曰：“《诗》云：‘如切如磋，如琢如磨’，其斯之谓与？”
conversation.output: 子贡说：“《诗经》上说，‘要像骨、角、象牙、玉石等的加工一样，先开料，再粗锉，细刻，然后磨光’，就是讲的这个意思吧？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“赐也，始可与言《诗》已矣，告诸往而知来者。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“赐呀，你能从我已经讲过的话中领会到我还没有说到的意思，举一反三，我现在可以同你谈论《诗经》了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“不患人之不己知，患不知人也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不要担心别人不了解自己，只需要担心自己不了解别人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 宪问耻，子曰：“邦有道，谷；邦无道，谷，耻也。”“克、伐、怨、欲不行焉，可以为仁矣？”子曰：“可以为难矣，仁则吾不知也。”
conversation.output: 原宪问孔子什么是可耻。孔子说：“国家太平时，做官拿俸禄；国家政治黑暗时，还做官拿俸禄，这就是可耻。”原宪又问：“好胜、自夸、怨恨、贪婪，这几种毛病都没有的人,可以算仁吗？”孔子说：“可以说是难能可贵，至于是否是仁，我就不能断定了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“士而怀居，不足以为士矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“士如果留恋家庭的安逸生活，就不配做士。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“邦有道，危言危行；邦无道，危行言孙。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“国家政局清明时，应该说 话正直，行为正直；政局混乱时，应该行 事依旧，但说话要谦逊谨慎些。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“有德者必有言，有言者不必有德。仁者必有勇，勇者不必有仁。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“有德行的人一定有善言，有善言的人却不一定有德行。有仁德的人必然勇敢，但勇敢的人不一定有仁德。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 南宫适问于孔子曰：“羿善射，奡荡舟，俱不得其死然；禹、稷躬稼而有天下。”夫子不答。南宫适出，子曰：“君子哉若人！尚德哉若人！”
conversation.output: 南宫适向孔子问道：“羿擅长射箭，奡善于水战，都没有得到善终。禹和稷亲自耕作庄稼，却得到了天下。”孔子没有回答。南宫适退出去后，孔子说：“这个人是君子啊！这个人崇尚道德啊！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子而不仁者有矣夫，未有小人而仁者也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子中也有没有仁德的，而小人之中是不会有有仁德的人的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“爱之，能勿劳乎？忠焉，能勿诲乎？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“爱他，能不以勤劳相劝勉吗？忠于他，能不以善言来教诲他吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“为命，裨谌草创之，世叔讨论之，行人子羽修饰之，东里子产润色之。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“郑国发表的公文，都是由裨谌起草的，世叔提出意见，外交官子羽加以修饰，由子产作最后修改润色。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 或问子产，子曰：“惠人也。”问子西，曰：“彼哉，彼哉！”问管仲，曰：“人也。夺伯氏骈邑三百，饭疏食，没齿无怨言。”
conversation.output: 有人问子产是个什么样的人。孔子说：“是个宽厚慈惠的人。”又问子西是个什么样的人。孔子说：“和子产一样，是个宽厚慈惠的人。”又问管仲是什么样的人，孔子说：“他是个有才能的，他剥夺了伯氏骈邑三百户的封地，使伯氏只能吃相粮，却至死没有怨言。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“贫而无怨难，富而无骄易。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“贫穷没有不满抱怨，是很难做到的，富贵了而不骄纵是容易做到的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“孟公绰为赵、魏老则优，不可以为滕、薛大夫。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“孟公绰担任晋国的赵氏、氏的家臣是绰绰有余的，但是做不了滕国和薛国这样小国的大夫。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路问成人，子曰：“若臧武仲之知、公绰之不欲、卞庄子之勇、冉求之艺，文之以礼乐，亦可以为成人矣。”曰：“今之成人者何必然？见利思义，见危授命，久要不忘平生之言，亦可以为成人矣。”
conversation.output: 子路问怎样做才是一个完美的人。孔子说：“像臧武仲那样有智慧，像孟公绰那样不贪求，像卞庄子那样勇敢，像冉求那样有才艺，再用礼乐来增加他的文采，就可以算个完人了。”孔子又说：“如今的完人何必要这样呢？见到利益能想到道义，遇到危险时肯献出生命，长期处在贫困之中也不忘平生的诺言，也就可以算是完人了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子问公叔文子于公明贾曰：“信乎，夫子不言，不笑，不取乎？”公明贾对曰：“以告者过也。夫子时然后言，人不厌其言；乐然后笑，人不厌其笑；义然后取，人不厌其取。”子曰：“其然？岂其然乎？”
conversation.output: 孔子向公明贾问到公叔文子，说：“先生他不说话、不笑、不取钱财，是真的吗？”公明贾回答道：“这是告诉你话的那个人的错。先生他到该说话的时候才说，因此别人不厌恶他的话；他等到快乐时才笑，因此别人不厌恶他笑；应该取的时候才取，别人不厌恶他的取。”孔子说：“原来这样，难道真是这样吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“臧武仲以防求为后于鲁，虽曰不要君，吾不信也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“臧武仲凭借防邑请求鲁君在鲁国替臧氏立后代，即便有人说他不是要挟君主，我不相信。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“晋文公谲而不正，齐桓公正而不谲。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“晋文公诡诈而不正派，齐桓公正派而不诡诈。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路曰：“桓公杀公子纠，召忽死之，管仲不死，曰未仁乎？”子曰：“桓公九合诸侯不以兵车，管仲之力也。如其仁，如其仁！”
conversation.output: 子路说：“齐桓公杀了公子纠，召忽自杀以殉，但管仲却没有死。管仲不能算是仁人吧？”孔子说：“桓公多次召集各诸侯国盟会，不用武力，都是管仲出的力。这就是他的仁德！这就是他的仁德！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡曰：“管仲非仁者与？桓公杀公子纠，不能死，又相之。”子曰：“管仲相桓公霸诸侯，一匡天下，民到于今受其赐。微管仲，吾其被发左衽矣。岂若匹夫匹妇之为谅也，自经于沟渎而莫之知也。”
conversation.output: 子贡说：“管仲不是仁人吧？齐桓公杀了公子纠，他不能以死相殉，反又去辅佐齐桓公。”孔子说：“管仲辅佐齐桓公，称霸诸侯，匡正天下一切，人民到现在还受到他的好处。如果没有管仲，我们大概都会披散着头发，衣襟向左边开了。难道他要像普通男女那样守着小节小信，在山沟中上吊自杀而没有人知道吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 公叔文子之臣大夫僎与文子同升诸公，子闻之,曰：“可以为‘文’矣。”
conversation.output: 公叔文子的家臣僎和文子一同做了卫国的大夫。孔子听说了这件事，说：“他死后可以给他“文”的谥号了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子言卫灵公之无道也，康子曰：“夫如是，奚而不丧？”孔子曰：“仲叔圉治宾客，祝鮀治宗庙，王孙贾治军旅，夫如是，奚其丧？”
conversation.output: 孔子讲到卫灵公的昏庸无道，季康子说：“既然如此，为什么他没有败亡呢？”孔子说：“因为他有仲叔圉主管外交，祝鮀管理宗庙祭祀，王孙贾统率军队，这样还怎么败亡呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“其言之不怍，则为之也难。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“说大话不感到惭愧的人，那么他实现这些话就是很困难的了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 陈成子弑简公，孔子沐浴而朝，告于哀公曰：“陈恒弑其君，请讨之。”公曰：“告夫三子。”,孔子曰：“以吾从大夫之后，不敢不告也，君曰‘告夫三子’者！”之三子告，不可。孔子曰：“以吾从大夫之后，不敢不告也。”
conversation.output: 成子杀了齐简公。孔子在家斋戎沐浴后去朝见鲁哀公，告诉哀公说：“陈恒杀了他的君主，请出兵讨伐他。”哀公说：“你去向季孙、仲孙、孟孙三人报告吧！” 孔子退朝后说：“因为我曾经做过大夫，不敢不来报告。可君主却对我说‘去向那三人报告’。”孔子去向那三位大夫报告，但三位大夫不愿派兵讨伐，孔子又说：“因为我曾经做过大夫，所以不敢不来报告呀！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路问事君，子曰：“勿欺也，而犯之。”
conversation.output: 子路问怎样事奉君主。孔子说：“不能欺骗他，但是可以直言劝谏。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子上达，小人下达。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子向上通达仁义，小人向下通达财利。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“古之学者为己，今之学者为人。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“古时候的人学习是为了提高自身的修养，现在的人学习是为了向别人炫耀。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 蘧伯玉使人于孔子，孔子与之坐而问焉，曰：“夫子何为？”对曰：“夫子欲寡其过而未能也。”使者出，子曰：“使乎！使乎！”
conversation.output: 蘧伯玉派使者去拜访孔子。孔子让使者坐下，然后问道：“先生最近在做什么？”使者回答说：“先生想要减少自己的过失但还没能做到。”使者出去之后，孔子说：“好一位使者呀！好一位使者呀！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“不在其位，不谋其政。”曾子曰：“君子思不出其位。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不在那个职位上，就不去考虑那个职位上的事。”曾子说：“君子考虑事情从来不超出自己的职权范围。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子耻其言而过其行。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子以说得多，做得少为耻辱。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子道者三，我无能焉：仁者不忧，知者不惑，勇者不惧。”子贡曰：“夫子自道也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子所循的三个方面，我都没能做到：仁德的人不忧愁，智慧的人不迷惑，勇敢的人不惧怕。”子贡说道：“是老师对自己的描述。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子贡方人，子曰：“赐也贤乎哉？夫我则不暇。”
conversation.output: 子贡评论别人的短处。孔子说：“赐啊，你真的就那么贤良吗？我可没有闲工夫去评论别人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“不患人之不己知，患其不能也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不要担心别人不了解自己，只要担心自己不了解别人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“不逆诈，不亿不信，抑亦先觉者，是贤乎！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不预先揣度别人在欺诈，也不凭空猜测别人不诚实，却又能及早发觉欺诈与不诚实，这就是贤人了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 微生亩谓孔子曰：“丘何为是栖栖者与？无乃为佞乎？”孔子曰：“非敢为佞也，疾固也。”
conversation.output: 微生亩对孔子说：“您为什么如此奔波忙碌呢？不是为了显示您的才辩吧？”孔子说：“我不敢显示我有才辩，只是讨厌那种顽固不化的人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曰：“骥不称其力，称其德也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“千里马值得称赞的不是它的气力，而是它的品德。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 或曰：“以德报怨，何如？”子曰：“何以报德？以直报怨，以德报德。”
conversation.output: 有人说：“用恩德来回报怨恨怎么样？”孔子说：“用什么来回报恩德呢？用正直来回报怨恨，用恩德来回报恩德。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“莫我知也夫！”子贡曰：“何为其莫知子也？”子曰：“不怨天，不尤人，下学而上达。知我者其天乎！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“没有人了解我啊！”子贡说：“怎么能说没有人了解您呢？”孔子说：“我不埋怨天，也不责备人，下学礼乐而上达天命，了解我的只有天吧！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 公伯寮愬子路于季孙。子服景伯以告，曰：“夫子固有惑志于公伯寮，吾力犹能肆诸市朝。”子曰：“道之将行也与，命也；道之将废也与，命也。公伯寮其如命何？”
conversation.output: 公伯寮向季孙氏控诉子路。子服景伯把这件事告诉了孔子，说：“季孙氏已经被公伯寮迷惑了，我的力量还能让公伯寮的尸首在街头示众。” 孔子说：“道将要实行，是天命决定的；道将要被废弃，也是天命决定的。公伯寮能把天命怎么样呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“贤者辟世，其次辟地，其次辟色，其次辟言。”子曰：“作者七人矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“贤人逃避动荡的社会而隐居，其次避开没有教化的地方，再次避开没有教养的脸色，再次避开没有涵养的言语。”孔子又说：“这样做的已经有七个人了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路宿于石门，晨门曰：“奚自？”子路曰：“自孔氏。”曰：“是知其不可而为之者与？”
conversation.output: 子路在石门住宿了一夜。早上守城门的人说：“从哪儿来？”子路说：“从孔子家来。”门人说：“就是那位知道做不成却还要做的人吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子击磬于卫，有荷蒉而过孔氏之门者，曰：“有心哉，击磬乎！”既而曰：“鄙哉，硁硁乎！莫己知也，斯己而已矣。深则厉，浅则揭。”子曰：“果哉！末之难矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子在卫国，一次正在敲击磬，有一位挑着草筐的人从孔子的门前走过说：“这个磬击打得有深意啊！”一会儿又说：“声音硁硁的，真可鄙呀，没有人了解自己，就只为自己就是了。（好像涉水一样）水深就穿着衣服趟过去，水浅就撩起衣服趟过去。”孔子说：“说得真干脆，没有什么可以责问他了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张曰：“《书》云，‘高宗谅阴，三年不言。’何谓也？”子曰：“何必高宗，古之人皆然。君薨，百官总己以听于冢宰三年。”
conversation.output: 子张说：“《尚书》上说，‘殷高宗守丧，三年不谈政事。’这是什么意思？”孔子说：“不仅是高宗，古人都是这样。国君死了，朝廷百官都各管自己的职事，听命于冢宰三年。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“上好礼，则民易使也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“居上位的人遇事依礼而行，那么百姓就容易指使了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路问君子，子曰：“修己以敬。”曰：“如斯而已乎？”曰：“修己以安人。”曰：“如斯而已乎？”曰：“修己以安百姓。修己以安百姓，尧、舜其犹病诸！”
conversation.output: 子路问怎样才能成为君子。孔子说：“常常慎重的培养、训练、教育好自己。”子路说：“这样就可以了吗？”孔子说：“修养自己，使周围的人们安乐。”子路说：“这样就够了吗？”孔子说：“修养自己，使所有百姓都安乐。修养自己使所有百姓都安乐，尧舜还怕难于做到呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 原壤夷俟，子曰：“幼而不孙弟，长而无述焉，老而不死，是为贼！”以杖叩其胫。
conversation.output: 原壤叉开双腿坐着等待孔子。孔子骂他说：“你年幼时不懂礼节，长大了也毫无成就，老了还不死，真是个害人精。”说着，用手杖敲他的小腿。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 阙党童子将命，或问之曰：“益者与？”子曰：“吾见其居于位也，见其与先生并行也。非求益者也，欲速成者也。”
conversation.output: 阙里的一个童子来向孔子传话。有人问孔子：“这小孩是肯求上进的人吗？”孔子说：“我看见他坐在成年人的位子上，又见他和长辈并肩而行。这不是个肯求上进的人，只是一个急于求成的人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 尧曰：“咨！尔舜，天之历数在尔躬，允执其中。四海困穷，天禄永终。”
conversation.output: 尧说：“啧啧！你这位舜！上天的大命已经落在你的身上了。真诚地执守中正之道吧！假如天下百姓都困苦贫穷，上天赐给你的禄位也就会永远终止。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 舜亦以命禹。曰：“予小子履，敢用玄牡，敢昭告于皇皇后帝：有罪不敢赦，帝臣不蔽，简在帝心。朕躬有罪，无以万方；万方有罪，罪在朕躬。”
conversation.output: 舜也这样告诫过禹。商汤说：“我履谨用黑色的公牛来祭祀，向伟大的天帝祷告：有罪的人我不敢擅自赦免，您的臣仆的善恶我也不隐瞒掩盖，都由天帝的心来分辨、选择。假如我有罪过，做错了事，世上各处的罪过，责任在我帝王身上。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 周有大赉，善人是富。“虽有周亲，不如仁人。百姓有过，在予一人。”
conversation.output: 周朝大封诸侯，使善人都富贵起来。周武王说：“我虽然有至亲，不如有仁德之人。百姓有过错，都在我一人身上。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 谨权量，审法度，修废官，四方之政行焉。
conversation.output: 认真检查度量衡器，周密地制定法度，修复已废弃的机关工作，全国的政令就会通行了。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 兴灭国，继绝世，举逸民，天下之民归心焉。
conversation.output: 复兴灭亡了的国家，承续已断绝的宗族，提拔被遗落的人才，天下的百姓就会诚心归服了。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 所重：民、食、丧、祭。宽则得众，信则民任焉，敏则有功，公则说。
conversation.output: 所重视的是：民众，粮食，丧礼，祭祀。 宽厚就会得到众人的拥护，诚恳守信就会得到民众的信任，勤敏就能取得功绩，公正则大家心悦诚服。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张问于孔子曰：“何如斯可以从政矣？”
conversation.output: 子张问孔子说：“怎样才可以治理政事呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“尊五美，屏四恶，斯可以从政矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“要尊崇五种美德，摒除四种恶政，这样就可以治理政事了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张曰：“何谓五美？”
conversation.output: 子张问：“五种美德是什么？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“君子惠而不费，劳而不怨，欲而不贪，泰而不骄，威而不猛。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“君子要给百姓以恩惠而自已却无所耗费；使百姓劳作而不使他们怨恨；要追求仁德而不贪图财利；庄重而不傲慢；威严而不凶猛。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张曰：“何谓惠而不费？”
conversation.output: 子张说：“怎样是使百姓恩惠而自己却无所耗费呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“因民之所利而利之，斯不亦惠而不费乎？择可劳而劳之，又谁怨？欲仁而得仁，又焉贪？君子无众寡，无小大，无敢慢，斯不亦泰而不骄乎？君子正其衣冠，尊其瞻视，俨然人望而畏之，斯不亦威而不猛乎？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“让百姓们去做对他们有利的事，这不就是对百姓有利而不耗费自己嘛！选择可以让百姓劳作的时间和事情让百姓去做。谁又会有怨言呢？自己要追求仁德便得到了仁，还贪求什么呢？君子对人，无论人多人少，势力是大是小，都会不怠慢他们，这不就是泰然自处而不骄傲吗？君子衣冠整齐，目不斜视，使人见了就让人生敬畏之心，这不也是威严而不凶猛吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子张曰：“何谓四恶？”
conversation.output: 子张问：“什么叫四种恶政呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“不教而杀谓之虐；不戒视成谓之暴；慢令致期谓之贼；犹之与人也，出纳之吝谓之有司。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不进行教化就杀戮叫作虐，不加申诫便强求别人做出成绩叫作暴，起先懈怠而又突然限期完成叫作贼，好比给人财物，出手吝啬叫作小家子气的官吏。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 孔子曰：“不知命，无以为君子也；不知礼，无以立也；不知言，无以知人也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不懂得天命，就不能做君子；不知道礼仪，就不能立身处世；不善于分辨别人的话语，就不能真正了解他。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 微子去之，箕子为之奴，比干谏而死。孔子曰：“殷有三仁焉。”
conversation.output: 微子离开了纣王，箕子做了他的奴隶，比干竭力劝谏纣王被剖心而死。孔子说：““殷朝有这三位仁人啊！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 柳下惠为士师，三黜。人曰：“子未可以去乎？”曰：“直道而事人，焉往而不三黜？枉道而事人，何必去父母之邦？”
conversation.output: 柳下惠担任掌管刑罚的官，被罢免了很多次。有人说：“你不可以离开鲁国吗？”柳下惠说：“用正直之道来侍奉人，去哪里而能不被多次罢免呢？不用正直之道来侍奉人，又为什么一定要离开故国家园呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 齐景公待孔子曰：“若季氏，则吾不能。”以季、孟之间待之，曰：“吾老矣，不能用也。”孔子行。
conversation.output: 齐景公讲到对待孔子的礼节时说：“像鲁国国君对待季氏那样对待孔子，那我做不到，只能用低于季氏而高于孟氏的规格来对待他。”又说：“我老了，不能用了。”孔子离开了齐国。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 齐人归女乐，季桓子受之，三日不朝，孔子行。”
conversation.output: 齐国人赠送了一些歌女给鲁国，季桓子接受了，三天不上朝。于是孔子离开了。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 楚狂接舆歌而过孔子曰：“凤兮凤兮，何德之衰？往者不可谏，来者犹可追。已而已而，今之从政者殆而！”孔子下，欲与之言，趋而辟之，不得与之言。
conversation.output: 楚国的狂人接舆唱着歌经过孔子的车旁，他唱道：“凤凰啊，凤凰啊，你的德运怎么这么衰弱呢？过去的已经无可挽回，未来的还可以补救。算了吧，算了吧。现在的当政的那些人太危险！”孔子下车，想同他谈谈，他却赶快避开，孔子没能和他交谈。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 长沮、桀溺耦而耕，孔子过之，使子路问津焉。
conversation.output: 长沮、桀溺在一起耕种，孔子路过，让子路去打听一下渡口在哪里。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 长沮曰：“夫执舆者为谁？”子路曰：“为孔丘。”曰：“是鲁孔丘与？”曰：“是也。”曰：“是知津矣。”
conversation.output: 长沮问子路：“那个拿着驾车的人是谁？”子路说：“是孔丘。”长沮又问；“是鲁国的孔丘吗？”子路说：“是的。”长沮说：“那他应该已经知道渡口的位置了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 问于桀溺，桀溺曰：“子为谁？”曰：“为仲由。”曰：“是鲁孔丘之徒与？”对曰：“然。”曰：“滔滔者天下皆是也，而谁以易之？且而与其从辟人之士也，岂若从辟世之士？”
conversation.output: 子路又去向打听桀溺。桀溺说：“你是谁？”子路说：“我是仲由。”桀溺说：“你是鲁国孔丘的弟子吗？”子路说：“是的。”桀溺说：“普天之下到处都像滔滔洪水一样混乱，和谁去改变这种状况呢？况且你与其跟从逃避坏人的人，还不如跟从逃避污浊尘世的人呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 耰而不辍。子路行以告，夫子怃然曰：“鸟兽不可与同群，吾非斯人之徒与而谁与？天下有道，丘不与易也。”
conversation.output: 说完，仍旧不停地做田里的农活。子路回来后把情况报告给孔子。孔子很失望地说：“人是不能与飞禽走兽合群共处的，如果不同世上的人群打交道还与谁打交道呢？如果天下太平，我就不会与你们一道来从事改革了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路从而后，遇丈人，以杖荷蓧。
conversation.output: 子路跟随孔子出行，落在了后面，遇到一个老丈，用拐杖挑着除草的工具。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路问曰：“子见夫子乎？”丈人曰：“四体不勤，五谷不分，孰为夫子？”
conversation.output: 子路问道：“你看到我的老师吗？”老丈说：“四肢不劳动，五谷分不清，谁是你的老师？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 植其杖而芸，子路拱而立。
conversation.output: 说完，便扶着拐杖去除草，子路拱着手恭敬地站在一旁。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 止子路宿，杀鸡为黍而食之，见其二子焉。
conversation.output: 老丈留子路到他家住宿，杀了鸡，做了小米饭给他吃，让自己的两个儿子出来拜见子路。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 明日，子路行以告，子曰：“隐者也。”
conversation.output: 第二天，子路赶上孔子，把这件事向他作了报告。孔子说：“这是个隐士啊。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 使子路反见之，至则行矣。
conversation.output: 叫子路回去再看看他。子路到了那里，老丈已经走了。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子路曰：“不仕无义。长幼之节不可废也，君臣之义如之何其废之？欲洁其身而乱大伦。君子之仕也，行其义也，道之不行已知之矣。”
conversation.output: 子路说：“不做官是不合义理的。长幼间的关系，是不可能废弃的；君臣间的关系，怎么能废弃呢？他想不玷污自身，却忽视了君臣间的大伦理。君子出来做官，是为了实行道义。主张不能实行，我早就知道了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 逸民：伯夷、叔齐、虞仲、夷逸、朱张、柳下惠、少连。
conversation.output: 被遗落的人有：伯夷、叔齐、虞仲、夷逸、朱张、柳下惠、少连。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“不降其志，不辱其身，伯夷、叔齐与！”谓：“柳下惠、少连降志辱身矣，言中伦，行中虑，其斯而已矣。”谓：“虞仲、夷逸隐居放言，身中清，废中权。我则异于是，无可无不可。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不降低自己的志向，不辱没自己的身份，就是伯夷和叔齐吧！”又说：“柳下惠、少连降低了自己的志向，辱没了自己的身份，但言语合乎伦理，行为经过考虑，也就是如此罢了。”又说：“虞仲、夷逸，避世隐居，放肆直言，立身清白，弃官合乎权宜。我就和他们不一样，没有什么可以，也没有什么不可以。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 太师挚适齐，亚饭干适楚，三饭缭适蔡，四饭缺适秦，鼓方叔入于河，播鼗武入于汉，少师阳、击磬襄入于海。
conversation.output: 太师挚到齐国去了，亚饭乐师干到楚国去了，三饭乐师缭到蔡国去了，四饭乐师缺到秦国去了，打鼓的乐师方叔去了黄河地区，敲小鼓的乐师武去了汉水一带，少师阳和击磬的襄到了海滨。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 周公谓鲁公曰：“君子不施其亲，不使大臣怨乎不以，故旧无大故则不弃也，无求备于一人。”
conversation.output: 周公对鲁公说：“一个有道的国君不疏远他的亲族；不使大臣怨恨没有被任用；故旧朋友如果没有大的过错，就不要抛弃他们；不要对一个人求全责备。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 周有八士：伯达、伯适、仲突、仲忽、叔夜、叔夏、季随、季騧。
conversation.output: 周代有八个有名的士人：伯达、伯适、伯突、仲忽、叔夜、叔夏、季随、季。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“泰伯，其可谓至德也已矣。三以天下让，民无得而称焉。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“泰伯可以说是品德最高尚的人了，多次把王位让给季历，老百姓都找不到恰当的词句来赞美他。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“恭而无礼则劳；慎而无礼则葸；勇而无礼则乱；直而无礼则绞。君子笃于亲，则民兴于仁；故旧不遗，则民不偷。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“恭敬却不知礼，就会徒劳无功；谨慎却不知礼，便会畏缩拘谨；勇猛却不知礼，容易莽撞闯祸；心直口快却不知礼，会显得尖利刻薄。君子能厚待自己的亲族，民众中则会兴起仁德的风气；君子不遗弃故交旧朋，那民众便不会对人冷淡漠然了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曾子有疾，召门弟子曰：“启予足，启予手。《诗》云：‘战战兢兢，如临深渊，如履薄冰。’而今而后，吾知免夫，小子！”
conversation.output: 曾子生病了，把他的学生召集到身边来，说道：“看看我的脚！看看我的手有没有损伤。如何做到没有损伤的呢？如诗所言：‘战战兢兢，如临深渊，如履薄冰。’从今以后，我才知道自己可以免于祸害刑戮了！弟子们！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曾子有疾，孟敬子问之。曾子言曰：“鸟之将死，其鸣也哀；人之将死，其言也善。君子所贵乎道者三：动容貌，斯远暴慢矣；正颜色，斯近信矣；出辞气，斯远鄙倍矣。笾豆之事，则有司存。”
conversation.output: 曾子有病，孟敬子去探望他。曾子对他说：“鸟快要死的时候，鸣叫的声音是悲哀的；人快要死的时候，说出来的话也是善良的。君子所应当重视的道有三个方面：使自己的容貌庄重严肃，这样就可以避免别人的粗暴和怠慢；使自己面色端庄严正，这样就容易使人信服；讲究言辞和声气，这样就可以避免粗野和错误。至于祭祀和礼节仪式，自有主管这些事务的官吏来负责。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曾子曰：“以能问于不能；以多问于寡；有若无，实若虚，犯而不校。昔者吾友尝从事于斯矣。”
conversation.output: 曾子说：“有才能却向没有才能的人请教，知识渊博的人却向知识浅薄的人请教；有学问却像没学问一样；满腹知识却像空虚无所有；即使被冒犯也不去计较。从前我的一位朋友就这样做过了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曾子曰：“可以托六尺之孤，可以寄百里之命，临大节而不可夺也。君子人与？君子人也。”
conversation.output: 曾子说：“可以把幼小的君主托付给他，可以把国家的政权寄放于他，即使在生死存亡关头也不会妥协。这样的人是君子吗？是君子啊！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 曾子曰：“士不可以不弘毅，任重而道远。仁以为己任，不亦重乎？死而后已，不亦远乎？”
conversation.output: 曾子说：“有抱负的人不可以不胸怀宽广，意志坚定，因为他肩负着重大的使命（或责任），路途又很遥远。把实现‘仁’的理想看作自己的使命，不也很重大吗？直到死才停止，这不也是很遥远吗？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“兴于《诗》，立于礼，成于乐。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“人的修养从学习《诗》开始，把礼作为立身的根基，掌握音乐使所学得以完成。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“民可，使由之。民不可，使知之。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“对于老百姓，只能使他们按照我们的意志去做，不能让他们知道为什么要这样做。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“好勇疾贫，乱也。人而不仁，疾之已甚，乱也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“喜欢勇敢逞强却厌恶贫困，是一种祸害。对不仁的人憎恶太过，也是一种祸害。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“如有周公之才之美，使骄且吝，其余不足观也已。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“即使有周公那样美好的才能，如果骄傲而吝啬的话，那其他方面也就不值得一提了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“三年学，不至于谷，不易得也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“读书三年，不是为了做官谋好职业，这是难能可贵的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“笃信好学，守死善道。危邦不入，乱邦不居。天下有道则见，无道则隐。邦有道，贫且贱焉，耻也；邦无道，富且贵焉，耻也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“做人要勤奋好学，要坚持真理，坚定信仰。处在危险境地的国家不进入，处在乱世的邦国不去居住。天下国家有正道就现身，荒乱无道就隐退。国家有道，而自己贫穷鄙贱，是耻辱；国家无道，而自己富有显贵，也是耻辱。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“不在其位，不谋其政。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不担任这个职务，就不去过问这个职务范围内的事情。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“师挚之始，《关雎》之乱，洋洋乎盈耳哉！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“从太师挚开始演奏，到结尾演奏《关雎》乐曲的时间里，丰富而优美的音乐在我耳边回荡。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“狂而不直，侗而不愿，悾悾而不信，吾不知之矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“狂妄而不正直，无知又不谨慎老实，表面上诚恳却不守信用，不知道为什么会有这样的人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“学如不及，犹恐失之。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“学习知识就像追赶什么似的，追赶上了又担心会丢失。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“巍巍乎！舜、禹之有天下也而不与焉。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“多么崇高啊！舜、禹拥有天下，不是为了自己享受却是为了黎明百姓。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“大哉尧之为君也！巍巍乎，唯天为大，唯尧则之。荡荡乎，民无能名焉。巍巍乎其有成功也，焕乎其有文章！”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“真伟大啊！真崇高啊！尧这样的君主。只有天最高最大，只有尧能效法于上天。他的恩德多么广大啊，百姓们真不知道该怎么来赞美他。真是崇高啊，他创建的功绩，真是崇高呀！他制定的礼仪制度，真是灿烂美好呀！”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 舜有臣五人而天下治。武王曰：“予有乱臣十人。”孔子曰：“才难，不其然乎？唐虞之际，于斯为盛；有妇人焉，九人而已。三分天下有其二，以服事殷。周之德，其可谓至德也已矣。”
conversation.output: 舜拥有了五位贤臣，就治理好了天下。周武王也说过：“我有十位能帮助我治理国家的贤臣。”孔子说：“人才难得，难道不是这样吗？唐尧、虞舜时代以及周武王时，人才最盛。然而武王十位治国人才中有一位还是妇女，所以实际上只有九人而已。周文王得了天下的三分之二，仍然事奉殷朝，周朝的道德，可以说是最高的了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“禹，吾无间然矣。菲饮食而致孝乎鬼神，恶衣服而致美乎黼冕，卑宫室而尽力乎沟洫。禹，吾无间然矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“对于禹，我对他没什么意见；他的饮食很简单却尽力去孝敬鬼神；衣服简朴，祭祀时却尽量穿得华美，他自己住的宫室很低矮，却把力量完全用于沟渠水利上。禹，我对他确实没有意见了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“述而不作，信而好古，窃比于我老彭。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“转述先哲的思想而不创立自己的思想，相信而且喜好古代的东西，我私下把自己比做老彭。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“默而识之，学而不厌，诲人不倦，何有于我哉？”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“默默地记住我所看到的听到的知识，努力学习而从不满足，教导别人而不知疲倦，这些事我做到了多少呢？”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“德之不修，学之不讲，闻义不能徙，不善不能改，是吾忧也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“不去修养品德，不去讲习学问，听到义却不追随，有了错误缺点不能改正，这些都是我所忧虑的事情。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子之燕居，申申如也，夭夭如也。
conversation.output: 孔子闲居在家的时候，衣着舒展齐整，仪态温和。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“甚矣吾衰也！久矣吾不复梦见周公。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我衰老得很厉害了，我已经好久没有梦见周公了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“志于道，据于德，依于仁，游于艺。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“以道为志向，以德为根据，以仁为依靠，而游憩于礼、乐、射、御、书、数六艺之中。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“自行束修以上，吾未尝无诲焉。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“只要谁愿意拿出干肉作为见面礼来拜见我，我从来没有不给他教诲的。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“不愤不启，不悱不发，举一隅不以三隅反，则不复也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“教导学生，不到他冥思苦想仍领会不了的时候，不去开导他；不到他想表达又找不到合适的言辞表达的时候，不去启发他。教给他一个东西，如果他不能举一反三，就不要重复教他了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子食于有丧者之侧，未尝饱也。
conversation.output: 孔子在有丧事的人旁边吃饭，从来没有吃饱过。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子于是日哭，则不歌。
conversation.output: 孔子在这一天为吊丧而哭泣过，就不再唱歌。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子谓颜渊曰：“用之则行，舍之则藏，惟我与尔有是夫！”子路曰：“子行三军，则谁与？”子曰：“暴虎冯河，死而无悔者，吾不与也。必也临事而惧，好谋而成者也。”
conversation.output: 孔子对颜渊说：“如果用我，就去积极行动；如果不用我，就藏起来。只有我和你才能这样吧！”子路说：“如果让您率领三军，您愿找谁一起共事呢？”孔子说：“赤手空拳和老虎搏斗，徒步涉水过大河，即使这样死了都不后悔的人，我是不会与他共事的。我所要找的共事的人，一定是遇事谨慎小心，善于谋划而且能完成任务的人。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“富而可求也，虽执鞭之士，吾亦为之。如不可求，从吾所好。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“如果富贵合乎于道就可以去追求，即使是手执马鞭做一个车夫，我也愿意去做。如果富贵不合于道就不必去追求，还是做自己喜欢做的事情。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子之所慎：齐，战，疾。
conversation.output: 孔子所谨慎小心对待的是斋戒、战争和疾病这三件事。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子在齐闻《韶》，三月不知肉味，曰：“不图为乐之至於斯也。”
conversation.output: 孔子在齐国听了乐曲《韶》后，很长一段时间吃肉也无法尝出肉的滋味，他说：“没想到对音乐的欣赏竟能达到如此高的境界。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 冉有曰：“夫子为卫君乎？”子贡曰：“诺，吾将问之。”入，曰：“伯夷、叔齐何人也？”曰：“古之贤人也。”曰：“怨乎？”曰：“求仁而得仁，又何怨？”出，曰：“夫子不为也。”
conversation.output: 冉有问子贡说：“老师会帮助卫国的国君吗？”子贡说：“嗯，我去问问他吧。”于是子贡就进去问孔子：“伯夷、叔齐是什么样的人呢？”孔子说：“古代的贤人。”子贡又问：“他们有怨恨吗？”孔子说：“他们求仁而得到了仁，为什么又怨恨呢？”子贡出来对冉有说：“老师不会帮助卫君。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“饭疏食饮水，曲肱而枕之，乐亦在其中矣。不义而富且贵，于我如浮云。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我整天吃粗粮，喝冷水，弯着胳膊做枕头，也自得其乐。用不正当的手段得来的富贵，我把它看作天上的浮云。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“加我数年，五十以学《易》，可以无大过矣。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“再给我增加几年寿命，让我到五十岁时学习《易经》，我便可以没有大的过错了。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子所雅言，《诗》、《书》、执礼，皆雅言也。
conversation.output: 孔子有时讲雅言，读《诗》、念《书》和执行礼事，用的都是雅言。

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 叶公问孔子于子路，子路不对。子曰：“女奚不曰：其为人也，发愤忘食，乐以忘忧，不知老之将至云尔。”
conversation.output: 叶公向子路问孔子是个什么样的人，子路不答。孔子对子路说：“你为什么不这样说：他这个人，发愤用功到连吃饭都忘了，快乐得忘记了忧愁，不知道衰老将要到来等等。”

conversation.system: You are a professional, highly experienced ancient Chinese translator. You always provide accurate, comprehensive, and detailed answers based on the askers' questions.
conversation.input: 子曰：“我非生而知之者，好古，敏以求之者也。”
conversation.output: 孔子说：“我不是生下来就懂得知识，只是喜爱古代的文化，勤奋敏捷地去求得知识。”
